55 // CBitmapButton - bitmap button implementation

57 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE

59 // bitmap button extended styles
60 #define BMPBTN_HOVER 0x00000001
61 #define BMPBTN_AUTO3D_SINGLE 0x00000002
62 #define BMPBTN_AUTO3D_DOUBLE 0x00000004
63 #define BMPBTN_AUTOSIZE 0x00000008
64 #define BMPBTN_SHAREIMAGELISTS 0x00000010
65 #define BMPBTN_AUTOFIRE 0x00000020
66 
67 template <class T, class TBase = CButton, class TWinTraits = ATL::CControlWinTraits>
68 class ATL_NO_VTABLE CBitmapButtonImpl : public ATL::CWindowImpl< T, TBase, TWinTraits>
69 {
70 public:
71  DECLARE_WND_SUPERCLASS(NULL, TBase::GetWndClassName())
72 
73  enum
74  {
75  _nImageNormal = 0,
76  _nImagePushed,
77  _nImageFocusOrHover,
78  _nImageDisabled,
79 
80  _nImageCount = 4,
81  };
82 
83  enum
84  {
85  ID_TIMER_FIRST = 1000,
86  ID_TIMER_REPEAT = 1001
87  };

89  // Bitmap button specific extended styles
90  DWORD m_dwExtendedStyle;
91 
92  CImageList m_ImageList;
93  int m_nImage[_nImageCount];
94 
95  CToolTipCtrl m_tip;
96  LPTSTR m_lpstrToolTipText;
97 
98  // Internal states
99  unsigned m_fMouseOver:1;
100  unsigned m_fFocus:1;
101  unsigned m_fPressed:1;

104 // Constructor/Destructor
105  CBitmapButtonImpl(DWORD dwExtendedStyle = BMPBTN_AUTOSIZE, HIMAGELIST hImageList = NULL) :
106  m_ImageList(hImageList), m_dwExtendedStyle(dwExtendedStyle),
107  m_lpstrToolTipText(NULL),
108  m_fMouseOver(0), m_fFocus(0), m_fPressed(0)
109  {
110  m_nImage[_nImageNormal] = -1;
111  m_nImage[_nImagePushed] = -1;
112  m_nImage[_nImageFocusOrHover] = -1;
113  m_nImage[_nImageDisabled] = -1;
114  }
115 
116  ~CBitmapButtonImpl()
117  {
118  if((m_dwExtendedStyle & BMPBTN_SHAREIMAGELISTS) == 0)
119  m_ImageList.Destroy();
120  delete [] m_lpstrToolTipText;
121  }
122 
123  // overridden to provide proper initialization
124  BOOL SubclassWindow(HWND hWnd)
125  {
126 #if (_MSC_VER >= 1300)
127  BOOL bRet = ATL::CWindowImpl< T, TBase, TWinTraits>::SubclassWindow(hWnd);
128 #else // !(_MSC_VER >= 1300)
129  typedef ATL::CWindowImpl< T, TBase, TWinTraits> _baseClass;
130  BOOL bRet = _baseClass::SubclassWindow(hWnd);
131 #endif // !(_MSC_VER >= 1300)
132  if(bRet)
133  Init();
134  return bRet;
135  }

137 // Attributes
138  DWORD GetBitmapButtonExtendedStyle() const
139  {
140  return m_dwExtendedStyle;
141  }
142 
143  DWORD SetBitmapButtonExtendedStyle(DWORD dwExtendedStyle, DWORD dwMask = 0)
144  {
145  DWORD dwPrevStyle = m_dwExtendedStyle;
146  if(dwMask == 0)
147  m_dwExtendedStyle = dwExtendedStyle;
148  else
149  m_dwExtendedStyle = (m_dwExtendedStyle & ~dwMask) | (dwExtendedStyle & dwMask);
150  return dwPrevStyle;
151  }
152 
153  HIMAGELIST GetImageList() const
154  {
155  return m_ImageList;
156  }
157 
158  HIMAGELIST SetImageList(HIMAGELIST hImageList)
159  {
160  HIMAGELIST hImageListPrev = m_ImageList;
161  m_ImageList = hImageList;
162  if((m_dwExtendedStyle & BMPBTN_AUTOSIZE) != 0 && ::IsWindow(m_hWnd))
163  SizeToImage();
164  return hImageListPrev;
165  }
166 
167  int GetToolTipTextLength() const
168  {
169  return (m_lpstrToolTipText == NULL) ? -1 : lstrlen(m_lpstrToolTipText);
170  }
171 
172  bool GetToolTipText(LPTSTR lpstrText, int nLength) const
173  {
174  ATLASSERT(lpstrText != NULL);
175  if(m_lpstrToolTipText == NULL)
176  return false;
177 
178  errno_t nRet = SecureHelper::strncpy_x(lpstrText, nLength, m_lpstrToolTipText, _TRUNCATE);
179 
180  return (nRet == 0 || nRet == STRUNCATE);
181  }
182 
183  bool SetToolTipText(LPCTSTR lpstrText)
184  {
185  if(m_lpstrToolTipText != NULL)
186  {
187  delete [] m_lpstrToolTipText;
188  m_lpstrToolTipText = NULL;
189  }
190 
191  if(lpstrText == NULL)
192  {
193  if(m_tip.IsWindow())
194  m_tip.Activate(FALSE);
195  return true;
196  }
197 
198  int cchLen = lstrlen(lpstrText) + 1;
199  ATLTRY(m_lpstrToolTipText = new TCHAR[cchLen]);
200  if(m_lpstrToolTipText == NULL)
201  return false;
202 
203  SecureHelper::strcpy_x(m_lpstrToolTipText, cchLen, lpstrText);
204  if(m_tip.IsWindow())
205  {
206  m_tip.Activate(TRUE);
207  m_tip.AddTool(m_hWnd, m_lpstrToolTipText);
208  }
209 
210  return true;
211  }
212 
213 // Operations
214  void SetImages(int nNormal, int nPushed = -1, int nFocusOrHover = -1, int nDisabled = -1)
215  {
216  if(nNormal != -1)
217  m_nImage[_nImageNormal] = nNormal;
218  if(nPushed != -1)
219  m_nImage[_nImagePushed] = nPushed;
220  if(nFocusOrHover != -1)
221  m_nImage[_nImageFocusOrHover] = nFocusOrHover;
222  if(nDisabled != -1)
223  m_nImage[_nImageDisabled] = nDisabled;
224  }
225 
226  BOOL SizeToImage()
227  {
228  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd) && m_ImageList.m_hImageList != NULL);
229  int cx = 0;
230  int cy = 0;
231  if(!m_ImageList.GetIconSize(cx, cy))
232  return FALSE;
233  return ResizeClient(cx, cy);
234  }
235 
236 // Overrideables
237  void DoPaint(CDCHandle dc)
238  {
239  ATLASSERT(m_ImageList.m_hImageList != NULL); // image list must be set
240  ATLASSERT(m_nImage[0] != -1); // main bitmap must be set
241 
242  // set bitmap according to the current button state
243  int nImage = -1;
244  bool bHover = IsHoverMode();
245  if(!IsWindowEnabled())
246  nImage = m_nImage[_nImageDisabled];
247  else if(m_fPressed == 1)
248  nImage = m_nImage[_nImagePushed];
249  else if((!bHover && m_fFocus == 1) || (bHover && m_fMouseOver == 1))
250  nImage = m_nImage[_nImageFocusOrHover];
251  if(nImage == -1) // not there, use default one
252  nImage = m_nImage[_nImageNormal];
253 
254  // draw the button image
255  int xyPos = 0;
256  if((m_fPressed == 1) && ((m_dwExtendedStyle & (BMPBTN_AUTO3D_SINGLE | BMPBTN_AUTO3D_DOUBLE)) != 0) && (m_nImage[_nImagePushed] == -1))
257  xyPos = 1;
258  m_ImageList.Draw(dc, nImage, xyPos, xyPos, ILD_NORMAL);
259 
260  // draw 3D border if required
261  if((m_dwExtendedStyle & (BMPBTN_AUTO3D_SINGLE | BMPBTN_AUTO3D_DOUBLE)) != 0)
262  {
263  RECT rect;
264  GetClientRect(&rect);
265 
266  if(m_fPressed == 1)
267  dc.DrawEdge(&rect, ((m_dwExtendedStyle & BMPBTN_AUTO3D_SINGLE) != 0) ? BDR_SUNKENOUTER : EDGE_SUNKEN, BF_RECT);
268  else if(!bHover || m_fMouseOver == 1)
269  dc.DrawEdge(&rect, ((m_dwExtendedStyle & BMPBTN_AUTO3D_SINGLE) != 0) ? BDR_RAISEDINNER : EDGE_RAISED, BF_RECT);
270 
271  if(!bHover && m_fFocus == 1)
272  {
273  ::InflateRect(&rect, -2 * ::GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXEDGE), -2 * ::GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYEDGE));
274  dc.DrawFocusRect(&rect);
275  }
276  }
277  }

309  LRESULT OnDestroy(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled)
310  {
311  if(m_tip.IsWindow())
312  {
313  m_tip.DestroyWindow();
314  m_tip.m_hWnd = NULL;
315  }
316  bHandled = FALSE;
317  return 1;
318  }

320  LRESULT OnMouseMessage(UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& bHandled)
321  {
322  MSG msg = { m_hWnd, uMsg, wParam, lParam };
323  if(m_tip.IsWindow())
324  m_tip.RelayEvent(&msg);
325  bHandled = FALSE;
326  return 1;
327  }

334  LRESULT OnPaint(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
335  {
336  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
337  if(wParam != NULL)
338  {
339  pT->DoPaint((HDC)wParam);
340  }
341  else
342  {
343  CPaintDC dc(m_hWnd);
344  pT->DoPaint(dc.m_hDC);
345  }
346  return 0;
347  }

349  LRESULT OnFocus(UINT uMsg, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled)
350  {
351  m_fFocus = (uMsg == WM_SETFOCUS) ? 1 : 0;
352  Invalidate();
353  UpdateWindow();
354  bHandled = FALSE;
355  return 1;
356  }
357 
358  LRESULT OnLButtonDown(UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
359  {
360  LRESULT lRet = 0;
361  if(IsHoverMode())
362  SetCapture();
363  else
364  lRet = DefWindowProc(uMsg, wParam, lParam);
365  if(::GetCapture() == m_hWnd)
366  {
367  m_fPressed = 1;
368  Invalidate();
369  UpdateWindow();
370  }
371  if((m_dwExtendedStyle & BMPBTN_AUTOFIRE) != 0)
372  {
373  int nElapse = 250;
374  int nDelay = 0;
375  if(::SystemParametersInfo(SPI_GETKEYBOARDDELAY, 0, &nDelay, 0))
376  nElapse += nDelay * 250; // all milli-seconds
377  SetTimer(ID_TIMER_FIRST, nElapse);
378  }
379  return lRet;
380  }
381 
382  LRESULT OnLButtonDblClk(UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
383  {
384  LRESULT lRet = 0;
385  if(!IsHoverMode())
386  lRet = DefWindowProc(uMsg, wParam, lParam);
387  if(::GetCapture() != m_hWnd)
388  SetCapture();
389  if(m_fPressed == 0)
390  {
391  m_fPressed = 1;
392  Invalidate();
393  UpdateWindow();
394  }
395  return lRet;
396  }
397 
398  LRESULT OnLButtonUp(UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
399  {
400  LRESULT lRet = 0;
401  bool bHover = IsHoverMode();
402  if(!bHover)
403  lRet = DefWindowProc(uMsg, wParam, lParam);
404  if(::GetCapture() == m_hWnd)
405  {
406  if(bHover && m_fPressed == 1)
407  ::SendMessage(GetParent(), WM_COMMAND, MAKEWPARAM(GetDlgCtrlID(), BN_CLICKED), (LPARAM)m_hWnd);
408  ::ReleaseCapture();
409  }
410  return lRet;
411  }
412 
413  LRESULT OnCaptureChanged(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled)
414  {
415  if(m_fPressed == 1)
416  {
417  m_fPressed = 0;
418  Invalidate();
419  UpdateWindow();
420  }
421  bHandled = FALSE;
422  return 1;
423  }
424 
425  LRESULT OnEnable(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled)
426  {
427  Invalidate();
428  UpdateWindow();
429  bHandled = FALSE;
430  return 1;
431  }
432 
433  LRESULT OnMouseMove(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& bHandled)
434  {
435  if(::GetCapture() == m_hWnd)
436  {
437  POINT ptCursor = { GET_X_LPARAM(lParam), GET_Y_LPARAM(lParam) };
438  ClientToScreen(&ptCursor);
439  RECT rect = { 0 };
440  GetWindowRect(&rect);
441  unsigned int uPressed = ::PtInRect(&rect, ptCursor) ? 1 : 0;
442  if(m_fPressed != uPressed)
443  {
444  m_fPressed = uPressed;
445  Invalidate();
446  UpdateWindow();
447  }
448  }
449  else if(IsHoverMode() && m_fMouseOver == 0)
450  {
451  m_fMouseOver = 1;
452  Invalidate();
453  UpdateWindow();
454  StartTrackMouseLeave();
455  }
456  bHandled = FALSE;
457  return 1;
458  }
459 
460  LRESULT OnMouseLeave(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
461  {
462  if(m_fMouseOver == 1)
463  {
464  m_fMouseOver = 0;
465  Invalidate();
466  UpdateWindow();
467  }
468  return 0;
469  }
470 
471  LRESULT OnKeyDown(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled)
472  {
473  if(wParam == VK_SPACE && IsHoverMode())
474  return 0; // ignore if in hover mode
475  if(wParam == VK_SPACE && m_fPressed == 0)
476  {
477  m_fPressed = 1;
478  Invalidate();
479  UpdateWindow();
480  }
481  bHandled = FALSE;
482  return 1;
483  }
484 
485  LRESULT OnKeyUp(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled)
486  {
487  if(wParam == VK_SPACE && IsHoverMode())
488  return 0; // ignore if in hover mode
489  if(wParam == VK_SPACE && m_fPressed == 1)
490  {
491  m_fPressed = 0;
492  Invalidate();
493  UpdateWindow();
494  }
495  bHandled = FALSE;
496  return 1;
497  }
498 
499  LRESULT OnTimer(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
500  {
501  ATLASSERT((m_dwExtendedStyle & BMPBTN_AUTOFIRE) != 0);
502  switch(wParam) // timer ID
503  {
504  case ID_TIMER_FIRST:
505  KillTimer(ID_TIMER_FIRST);
506  if(m_fPressed == 1)
507  {
508  ::SendMessage(GetParent(), WM_COMMAND, MAKEWPARAM(GetDlgCtrlID(), BN_CLICKED), (LPARAM)m_hWnd);
509  int nElapse = 250;
510  int nRepeat = 40;
511  if(::SystemParametersInfo(SPI_GETKEYBOARDSPEED, 0, &nRepeat, 0))
512  nElapse = 10000 / (10 * nRepeat + 25); // milli-seconds, approximated
513  SetTimer(ID_TIMER_REPEAT, nElapse);
514  }
515  break;
516  case ID_TIMER_REPEAT:
517  if(m_fPressed == 1)
518  ::SendMessage(GetParent(), WM_COMMAND, MAKEWPARAM(GetDlgCtrlID(), BN_CLICKED), (LPARAM)m_hWnd);
519  else if(::GetCapture() != m_hWnd)
520  KillTimer(ID_TIMER_REPEAT);
521  break;
522  default: // not our timer
523  break;
524  }
525  return 0;
526  }
527 
528  LRESULT OnUpdateUiState(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
529  {
530  // If the control is subclassed or superclassed, this message can cause
531  // repainting without WM_PAINT. We don't use this state, so just do nothing.
532  return 0;
533  }
534 
535 // Implementation
536  void Init()
537  {
538  // We need this style to prevent Windows from painting the button
539  ModifyStyle(0, BS_OWNERDRAW);
540 
541  // create a tool tip
542  m_tip.Create(m_hWnd);
543  ATLASSERT(m_tip.IsWindow());
544  if(m_tip.IsWindow() && m_lpstrToolTipText != NULL)
545  {
546  m_tip.Activate(TRUE);
547  m_tip.AddTool(m_hWnd, m_lpstrToolTipText);
548  }
549 
550  if(m_ImageList.m_hImageList != NULL && (m_dwExtendedStyle & BMPBTN_AUTOSIZE) != 0)
551  SizeToImage();
552  }
553 
554  BOOL StartTrackMouseLeave()
555  {
556  TRACKMOUSEEVENT tme = { 0 };
557  tme.cbSize = sizeof(tme);
558  tme.dwFlags = TME_LEAVE;
559  tme.hwndTrack = m_hWnd;
560  return _TrackMouseEvent(&tme);
561  }
562 
563  bool IsHoverMode() const
564  {
565  return ((m_dwExtendedStyle & BMPBTN_HOVER) != 0);
566  }
567 };

605 typedef CCheckListViewCtrlImplTraits<WS_CHILD | WS_VISIBLE | LVS_REPORT | LVS_SHOWSELALWAYS, WS_EX_CLIENTEDGE, LVS_EX_CHECKBOXES | LVS_EX_FULLROWSELECT> CCheckListViewCtrlTraits;

607 template <class T, class TBase = CListViewCtrl, class TWinTraits = CCheckListViewCtrlTraits>
608 class ATL_NO_VTABLE CCheckListViewCtrlImpl : public ATL::CWindowImpl<T, TBase, TWinTraits>
609 {
610 public:
611  DECLARE_WND_SUPERCLASS(NULL, TBase::GetWndClassName())
612 
613 // Attributes
614  static DWORD GetExtendedLVStyle()
615  {
616  return TWinTraits::GetExtendedLVStyle();
617  }
618 
619 // Operations
620  BOOL SubclassWindow(HWND hWnd)
621  {
622 #if (_MSC_VER >= 1300)
623  BOOL bRet = ATL::CWindowImplBaseT< TBase, TWinTraits>::SubclassWindow(hWnd);
624 #else // !(_MSC_VER >= 1300)
625  typedef ATL::CWindowImplBaseT< TBase, TWinTraits> _baseClass;
626  BOOL bRet = _baseClass::SubclassWindow(hWnd);
627 #endif // !(_MSC_VER >= 1300)
628  if(bRet)
629  {
630  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
631  pT;
632  ATLASSERT((pT->GetExtendedLVStyle() & LVS_EX_CHECKBOXES) != 0);
633  SetExtendedListViewStyle(pT->GetExtendedLVStyle());
634  }
635  return bRet;
636  }
637 
638  void CheckSelectedItems(int nCurrItem)
639  {
640  // first check if this item is selected
641  LVITEM lvi = { 0 };
642  lvi.iItem = nCurrItem;
643  lvi.iSubItem = 0;
644  lvi.mask = LVIF_STATE;
645  lvi.stateMask = LVIS_SELECTED;
646  GetItem(&lvi);
647  // if item is not selected, don't do anything
648  if(!(lvi.state & LVIS_SELECTED))
649  return;
650  // new check state will be reverse of the current state,
651  BOOL bCheck = !GetCheckState(nCurrItem);
652  int nItem = -1;
653  int nOldItem = -1;
654  while((nItem = GetNextItem(nOldItem, LVNI_SELECTED)) != -1)
655  {
656  if(nItem != nCurrItem)
657  SetCheckState(nItem, bCheck);
658  nOldItem = nItem;
659  }
660  }
661 
662 // Implementation
663  BEGIN_MSG_MAP(CCheckListViewCtrlImpl)
664  MESSAGE_HANDLER(WM_CREATE, OnCreate)
665  MESSAGE_HANDLER(WM_LBUTTONDOWN, OnLButtonDown)
666  MESSAGE_HANDLER(WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK, OnLButtonDown)
667  MESSAGE_HANDLER(WM_KEYDOWN, OnKeyDown)
668  END_MSG_MAP()
669 
670  LRESULT OnCreate(UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
671  {
672  // first let list view control initialize everything
673  LRESULT lRet = DefWindowProc(uMsg, wParam, lParam);
674  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
675  pT;
676  ATLASSERT((pT->GetExtendedLVStyle() & LVS_EX_CHECKBOXES) != 0);
677  SetExtendedListViewStyle(pT->GetExtendedLVStyle());
678  return lRet;
679  }
680 
681  LRESULT OnLButtonDown(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& bHandled)
682  {
683  POINT ptMsg = { GET_X_LPARAM(lParam), GET_Y_LPARAM(lParam) };
684  LVHITTESTINFO lvh = { 0 };
685  lvh.pt = ptMsg;
686  if(HitTest(&lvh) != -1 && lvh.flags == LVHT_ONITEMSTATEICON && ::GetKeyState(VK_CONTROL) >= 0)
687  {
688  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
689  pT->CheckSelectedItems(lvh.iItem);
690  }
691  bHandled = FALSE;
692  return 1;
693  }
694 
695  LRESULT OnKeyDown(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled)
696  {
697  if(wParam == VK_SPACE)
698  {
699  int nCurrItem = GetNextItem(-1, LVNI_FOCUSED);
700  if(nCurrItem != -1 && ::GetKeyState(VK_CONTROL) >= 0)
701  {
702  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
703  pT->CheckSelectedItems(nCurrItem);
704  }
705  }
706  bHandled = FALSE;
707  return 1;
708  }
709 };

755 #define HLINK_UNDERLINED 0x00000000
756 #define HLINK_NOTUNDERLINED 0x00000001
757 #define HLINK_UNDERLINEHOVER 0x00000002
758 #define HLINK_COMMANDBUTTON 0x00000004
759 #define HLINK_NOTIFYBUTTON 0x0000000C
760 #define HLINK_USETAGS 0x00000010
761 #define HLINK_USETAGSBOLD 0x00000030
762 #define HLINK_NOTOOLTIP 0x00000040
763 #define HLINK_AUTOCREATELINKFONT 0x00000080
764 #define HLINK_SINGLELINE 0x00000100
765 
766 // Notes:
767 // - HLINK_USETAGS and HLINK_USETAGSBOLD are always left-aligned
768 // - When HLINK_USETAGSBOLD is used, the underlined styles will be ignored
769

787  COLORREF m_clrVisited;

827  DWORD SetHyperLinkExtendedStyle(DWORD dwExtendedStyle, DWORD dwMask = 0)
828  {
829  DWORD dwPrevStyle = m_dwExtendedStyle;
830  if(dwMask == 0)
831  m_dwExtendedStyle = dwExtendedStyle;
832  else
833  m_dwExtendedStyle = (m_dwExtendedStyle & ~dwMask) | (dwExtendedStyle & dwMask);
834  return dwPrevStyle;

837  bool GetLabel(LPTSTR lpstrBuffer, int nLength) const
838  {
839  if(m_lpstrLabel == NULL)
840  return false;
841  ATLASSERT(lpstrBuffer != NULL);
842  if(nLength <= lstrlen(m_lpstrLabel))
843  return false;
844 
845  SecureHelper::strcpy_x(lpstrBuffer, nLength, m_lpstrLabel);
846 
847  return true;
848  }
849 
850  bool SetLabel(LPCTSTR lpstrLabel)
851  {
852  delete [] m_lpstrLabel;
853  m_lpstrLabel = NULL;
854  int cchLen = lstrlen(lpstrLabel) + 1;
855  ATLTRY(m_lpstrLabel = new TCHAR[cchLen]);
856  if(m_lpstrLabel == NULL)
857  return false;
858 
859  SecureHelper::strcpy_x(m_lpstrLabel, cchLen, lpstrLabel);
860  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
861  pT->CalcLabelRect();
862 
863  if(m_hWnd != NULL)
864  SetWindowText(lpstrLabel); // Set this for accessibility
865 
866  return true;
867  }
868 
869  bool GetHyperLink(LPTSTR lpstrBuffer, int nLength) const
870  {
871  if(m_lpstrHyperLink == NULL)
872  return false;
873  ATLASSERT(lpstrBuffer != NULL);
874  if(nLength <= lstrlen(m_lpstrHyperLink))
875  return false;
876 
877  SecureHelper::strcpy_x(lpstrBuffer, nLength, m_lpstrHyperLink);
878 
879  return true;
880  }
881 
882  bool SetHyperLink(LPCTSTR lpstrLink)
883  {
884  delete [] m_lpstrHyperLink;
885  m_lpstrHyperLink = NULL;
886  int cchLen = lstrlen(lpstrLink) + 1;
887  ATLTRY(m_lpstrHyperLink = new TCHAR[cchLen]);
888  if(m_lpstrHyperLink == NULL)
889  return false;
890 
891  SecureHelper::strcpy_x(m_lpstrHyperLink, cchLen, lpstrLink);
892  if(m_lpstrLabel == NULL)
893  {
894  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
895  pT->CalcLabelRect();
896  }
897 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
898  if(m_tip.IsWindow())
899  {
900  m_tip.Activate(TRUE);
901  m_tip.AddTool(m_hWnd, m_lpstrHyperLink, &m_rcLink, 1);
902  }
903 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
904  return true;
905  }

926  int GetIdealHeight() const
927  {
928  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
929  if(m_lpstrLabel == NULL && m_lpstrHyperLink == NULL)
930  return -1;
931  if(!m_bPaintLabel)
932  return -1;
933 
934  UINT uFormat = IsSingleLine() ? DT_SINGLELINE : DT_WORDBREAK;
935 
936  CClientDC dc(m_hWnd);
937  RECT rect = { 0 };
938  GetClientRect(&rect);
939  HFONT hFontOld = dc.SelectFont(m_hFontNormal);
940  RECT rcText = rect;
941  dc.DrawText(_T("NS"), -1, &rcText, DT_LEFT | uFormat | DT_CALCRECT);
942  dc.SelectFont(m_hFontLink);
943  RECT rcLink = rect;
944  dc.DrawText(_T("NS"), -1, &rcLink, DT_LEFT | uFormat | DT_CALCRECT);
945  dc.SelectFont(hFontOld);
946  return max(rcText.bottom - rcText.top, rcLink.bottom - rcLink.top);
947  }
948 
949  bool GetIdealSize(SIZE& size) const
950  {
951  int cx = 0, cy = 0;
952  bool bRet = GetIdealSize(cx, cy);
953  if(bRet)
954  {
955  size.cx = cx;
956  size.cy = cy;
957  }
958  return bRet;
959  }
960 
961  bool GetIdealSize(int& cx, int& cy) const
962  {
963  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
964  if(m_lpstrLabel == NULL && m_lpstrHyperLink == NULL)
965  return false;
966  if(!m_bPaintLabel)
967  return false;
968 
969  CClientDC dc(m_hWnd);
970  RECT rcClient = { 0 };
971  GetClientRect(&rcClient);
972  RECT rcAll = rcClient;
973 
974  if(IsUsingTags())
975  {
976  // find tags and label parts
977  LPTSTR lpstrLeft = NULL;
978  int cchLeft = 0;
979  LPTSTR lpstrLink = NULL;
980  int cchLink = 0;
981  LPTSTR lpstrRight = NULL;
982  int cchRight = 0;
983 
984  const T* pT = static_cast<const T*>(this);
985  pT->CalcLabelParts(lpstrLeft, cchLeft, lpstrLink, cchLink, lpstrRight, cchRight);
986 
987  // get label part rects
988  UINT uFormat = IsSingleLine() ? DT_SINGLELINE : DT_WORDBREAK;
989 
990  HFONT hFontOld = dc.SelectFont(m_hFontNormal);
991  RECT rcLeft = rcClient;
992  dc.DrawText(lpstrLeft, cchLeft, &rcLeft, DT_LEFT | uFormat | DT_CALCRECT);
993 
994  dc.SelectFont(m_hFontLink);
995  RECT rcLink = { rcLeft.right, rcLeft.top, rcClient.right, rcClient.bottom };
996  dc.DrawText(lpstrLink, cchLink, &rcLink, DT_LEFT | uFormat | DT_CALCRECT);
997 
998  dc.SelectFont(m_hFontNormal);
999  RECT rcRight = { rcLink.right, rcLink.top, rcClient.right, rcClient.bottom };
1000  dc.DrawText(lpstrRight, cchRight, &rcRight, DT_LEFT | uFormat | DT_CALCRECT);
1001 
1002  dc.SelectFont(hFontOld);
1003 
1004  int cyMax = max(rcLeft.bottom, max(rcLink.bottom, rcRight.bottom));
1005  ::SetRect(&rcAll, rcLeft.left, rcLeft.top, rcRight.right, cyMax);
1006  }
1007  else
1008  {
1009  HFONT hOldFont = NULL;
1010  if(m_hFontLink != NULL)
1011  hOldFont = dc.SelectFont(m_hFontLink);
1012  LPTSTR lpstrText = (m_lpstrLabel != NULL) ? m_lpstrLabel : m_lpstrHyperLink;
1013  DWORD dwStyle = GetStyle();
1014  UINT uFormat = DT_LEFT;
1015  if (dwStyle & SS_CENTER)
1016  uFormat = DT_CENTER;
1017  else if (dwStyle & SS_RIGHT)
1018  uFormat = DT_RIGHT;
1019  uFormat |= IsSingleLine() ? DT_SINGLELINE : DT_WORDBREAK;
1020  dc.DrawText(lpstrText, -1, &rcAll, uFormat | DT_CALCRECT);
1021  if(m_hFontLink != NULL)
1022  dc.SelectFont(hOldFont);
1023  if (dwStyle & SS_CENTER)
1024  {
1025  int dx = (rcClient.right - rcAll.right) / 2;
1026  ::OffsetRect(&rcAll, dx, 0);
1027  }
1028  else if (dwStyle & SS_RIGHT)
1029  {
1030  int dx = rcClient.right - rcAll.right;
1031  ::OffsetRect(&rcAll, dx, 0);
1032  }
1033  }
1034 
1035  cx = rcAll.right - rcAll.left;
1036  cy = rcAll.bottom - rcAll.top;
1037 
1038  return true;
1039  }
1040 
1041  // for command buttons only
1042  bool GetToolTipText(LPTSTR lpstrBuffer, int nLength) const
1043  {
1044  ATLASSERT(IsCommandButton());
1045  return GetHyperLink(lpstrBuffer, nLength);
1046  }
1047 
1048  bool SetToolTipText(LPCTSTR lpstrToolTipText)
1049  {
1050  ATLASSERT(IsCommandButton());
1051  return SetHyperLink(lpstrToolTipText);
1052  }

1054 // Operations
1055  BOOL SubclassWindow(HWND hWnd)
1056  {
1057  ATLASSERT(m_hWnd == NULL);
1058  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(hWnd));
1059  if(m_hFontNormal == NULL)
1060  m_hFontNormal = (HFONT)::SendMessage(hWnd, WM_GETFONT, 0, 0L);
1061 #if (_MSC_VER >= 1300)
1062  BOOL bRet = ATL::CWindowImpl< T, TBase, TWinTraits>::SubclassWindow(hWnd);
1063 #else // !(_MSC_VER >= 1300)
1064  typedef ATL::CWindowImpl< T, TBase, TWinTraits> _baseClass;
1065  BOOL bRet = _baseClass::SubclassWindow(hWnd);
1066 #endif // !(_MSC_VER >= 1300)
1067  if(bRet)
1068  {
1069  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
1070  pT->Init();
1071  }
1072  return bRet;
1073  }
1074 
1075  bool Navigate()
1076  {
1077  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
1078  bool bRet = true;
1079  if(IsNotifyButton())
1080  {
1081  NMHDR nmhdr = { m_hWnd, GetDlgCtrlID(), NM_CLICK };
1082  ::SendMessage(GetParent(), WM_NOTIFY, GetDlgCtrlID(), (LPARAM)&nmhdr);
1083  }
1084  else if(IsCommandButton())
1085  {
1086  ::SendMessage(GetParent(), WM_COMMAND, MAKEWPARAM(GetDlgCtrlID(), BN_CLICKED), (LPARAM)m_hWnd);
1087  }
1088  else
1089  {
1090  ATLASSERT(m_lpstrHyperLink != NULL);
1091 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
1092  DWORD_PTR dwRet = (DWORD_PTR)::ShellExecute(0, _T("open"), m_lpstrHyperLink, 0, 0, SW_SHOWNORMAL);
1093  bRet = (dwRet > 32);
1094 #else // CE specific
1095  SHELLEXECUTEINFO shExeInfo = { sizeof(SHELLEXECUTEINFO), 0, 0, L"open", m_lpstrHyperLink, 0, 0, SW_SHOWNORMAL, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
1096  ::ShellExecuteEx(&shExeInfo);
1097  DWORD_PTR dwRet = (DWORD_PTR)shExeInfo.hInstApp;
1098  bRet = (dwRet == 0) || (dwRet > 32);
1099 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
1100  ATLASSERT(bRet);
1101  if(bRet)
1102  {
1103  m_bVisited = true;
1104  Invalidate();
1105  }
1106  }
1107  return bRet;
1108  }
1109 
1110  void CreateLinkFontFromNormal()
1111  {
1112  if(m_bInternalLinkFont)
1113  {
1114  ::DeleteObject(m_hFontLink);
1115  m_bInternalLinkFont = false;
1116  }
1117 
1118  CFontHandle font = (m_hFontNormal != NULL) ? m_hFontNormal : (HFONT)::GetStockObject(SYSTEM_FONT);
1119  LOGFONT lf = { 0 };
1120  font.GetLogFont(&lf);
1121 
1122  if(IsUsingTagsBold())
1123  lf.lfWeight = FW_BOLD;
1124  else if(!IsNotUnderlined())
1125  lf.lfUnderline = TRUE;
1126 
1127  m_hFontLink = ::CreateFontIndirect(&lf);
1128  m_bInternalLinkFont = true;
1129  ATLASSERT(m_hFontLink != NULL);
1130  }

1211  LRESULT OnPaint(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& bHandled)
1212  {
1213  if(!m_bPaintLabel)
1214  {
1215  bHandled = FALSE;
1216  return 1;
1217  }
1218 
1219  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
1220  if(wParam != NULL)
1221  {
1222  pT->DoEraseBackground((HDC)wParam);
1223  pT->DoPaint((HDC)wParam);
1224  }
1225  else
1226  {
1227  CPaintDC dc(m_hWnd);
1228  pT->DoEraseBackground(dc.m_hDC);
1229  pT->DoPaint(dc.m_hDC);
1230  }
1231 
1232  return 0;
1233  }
1234

1236  {

1238  Invalidate();
1239  else

1400 // Implementation
1401  void Init()
1402  {
1403  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
1404 
1405  // Check if we should paint a label
1406  const int cchBuff = 8;
1407  TCHAR szBuffer[cchBuff] = { 0 };
1408  if(::GetClassName(m_hWnd, szBuffer, cchBuff))
1409  {
1410  if(lstrcmpi(szBuffer, _T("static")) == 0)
1411  {
1412  ModifyStyle(0, SS_NOTIFY); // we need this
1413  DWORD dwStyle = GetStyle() & 0x000000FF;
1414 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
1415  if(dwStyle == SS_ICON || dwStyle == SS_BLACKRECT || dwStyle == SS_GRAYRECT ||
1416  dwStyle == SS_WHITERECT || dwStyle == SS_BLACKFRAME || dwStyle == SS_GRAYFRAME ||
1417  dwStyle == SS_WHITEFRAME || dwStyle == SS_OWNERDRAW ||
1418  dwStyle == SS_BITMAP || dwStyle == SS_ENHMETAFILE)
1419 #else // CE specific
1420  if(dwStyle == SS_ICON || dwStyle == SS_BITMAP)
1421 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
1422  m_bPaintLabel = false;
1423  }
1424  }
1425 
1426  // create or load a cursor
1427 #if (WINVER >= 0x0500) || defined(_WIN32_WCE)
1428  m_hCursor = ::LoadCursor(NULL, IDC_HAND);
1429 #else
1430  m_hCursor = ::CreateCursor(ModuleHelper::GetModuleInstance(), _AtlHyperLink_CursorData.xHotSpot, _AtlHyperLink_CursorData.yHotSpot, _AtlHyperLink_CursorData.cxWidth, _AtlHyperLink_CursorData.cyHeight, _AtlHyperLink_CursorData.arrANDPlane, _AtlHyperLink_CursorData.arrXORPlane);
1431 #endif
1432  ATLASSERT(m_hCursor != NULL);
1433 
1434  // set fonts
1435  if(m_bPaintLabel)
1436  {
1437  if(m_hFontNormal == NULL)
1438  {
1439  m_hFontNormal = AtlCreateControlFont();
1440  m_bInternalNormalFont = true;
1441  }
1442 
1443  if(m_hFontLink == NULL)
1444  CreateLinkFontFromNormal();
1445  }
1446 
1447 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
1448  // create a tool tip
1449  m_tip.Create(m_hWnd);
1450  ATLASSERT(m_tip.IsWindow());
1451 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
1452 
1453  // set label (defaults to window text)
1454  if(m_lpstrLabel == NULL)
1455  {
1456  int nLen = GetWindowTextLength();
1457  if(nLen > 0)
1458  {
1459  ATLTRY(m_lpstrLabel = new TCHAR[nLen + 1]);
1460  if(m_lpstrLabel != NULL)
1461  ATLVERIFY(GetWindowText(m_lpstrLabel, nLen + 1) > 0);
1462  }
1463  }
1464 
1465  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
1466  pT->CalcLabelRect();
1467 
1468  // set hyperlink (defaults to label), or just activate tool tip if already set
1469  if(m_lpstrHyperLink == NULL && !IsCommandButton())
1470  {
1471  if(m_lpstrLabel != NULL)
1472  SetHyperLink(m_lpstrLabel);
1473  }
1474 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
1475  else
1476  {
1477  m_tip.Activate(TRUE);
1478  m_tip.AddTool(m_hWnd, m_lpstrHyperLink, &m_rcLink, 1);
1479  }
1480 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
1481 
1482  // set link colors
1483  if(m_bPaintLabel)
1484  {
1485  CRegKeyEx rk;
1486  LONG lRet = rk.Open(HKEY_CURRENT_USER, _T("Software\\Microsoft\\Internet Explorer\\Settings"));
1487  if(lRet == ERROR_SUCCESS)
1488  {
1489  const int cchValue = 12;
1490  TCHAR szValue[cchValue] = { 0 };
1491  ULONG ulCount = cchValue;
1492  lRet = rk.QueryStringValue(_T("Anchor Color"), szValue, &ulCount);
1493  if(lRet == ERROR_SUCCESS)
1494  {
1495  COLORREF clr = pT->_ParseColorString(szValue);
1496  ATLASSERT(clr != CLR_INVALID);
1497  if(clr != CLR_INVALID)
1498  m_clrLink = clr;
1499  }
1500 
1501  ulCount = cchValue;
1502  lRet = rk.QueryStringValue(_T("Anchor Color Visited"), szValue, &ulCount);
1503  if(lRet == ERROR_SUCCESS)
1504  {
1505  COLORREF clr = pT->_ParseColorString(szValue);
1506  ATLASSERT(clr != CLR_INVALID);
1507  if(clr != CLR_INVALID)
1508  m_clrVisited = clr;
1509  }
1510  }
1511  }
1512  }
1513 
1514  static COLORREF _ParseColorString(LPTSTR lpstr)
1515  {
1516  int c[3] = { -1, -1, -1 };
1517  LPTSTR p = NULL;
1518  for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
1519  {
1520  for(p = lpstr; *p != _T('\0'); p = ::CharNext(p))
1521  {
1522  if(*p == _T(','))
1523  {
1524  *p = _T('\0');
1525  c[i] = MinCrtHelper::_atoi(lpstr);
1526  lpstr = &p[1];
1527  break;
1528  }
1529  }
1530  if(c[i] == -1)
1531  return CLR_INVALID;
1532  }
1533  if(*lpstr == _T('\0'))
1534  return CLR_INVALID;
1535  c[2] = MinCrtHelper::_atoi(lpstr);
1536 
1537  return RGB(c[0], c[1], c[2]);
1538  }
1539 
1540  bool CalcLabelRect()
1541  {
1542  if(!::IsWindow(m_hWnd))
1543  return false;
1544  if(m_lpstrLabel == NULL && m_lpstrHyperLink == NULL)
1545  return false;
1546 
1547  CClientDC dc(m_hWnd);
1548  RECT rcClient = { 0 };
1549  GetClientRect(&rcClient);
1550  m_rcLink = rcClient;
1551  if(!m_bPaintLabel)
1552  return true;
1553 
1554  if(IsUsingTags())
1555  {
1556  // find tags and label parts
1557  LPTSTR lpstrLeft = NULL;
1558  int cchLeft = 0;
1559  LPTSTR lpstrLink = NULL;
1560  int cchLink = 0;
1561  LPTSTR lpstrRight = NULL;
1562  int cchRight = 0;
1563 
1564  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
1565  pT->CalcLabelParts(lpstrLeft, cchLeft, lpstrLink, cchLink, lpstrRight, cchRight);
1566  ATLASSERT(lpstrLink != NULL);
1567  ATLASSERT(cchLink > 0);
1568 
1569  // get label part rects
1570  HFONT hFontOld = dc.SelectFont(m_hFontNormal);
1571 
1572  UINT uFormat = IsSingleLine() ? DT_SINGLELINE : DT_WORDBREAK;
1573 
1574  RECT rcLeft = rcClient;
1575  if(lpstrLeft != NULL)
1576  dc.DrawText(lpstrLeft, cchLeft, &rcLeft, DT_LEFT | uFormat | DT_CALCRECT);
1577 
1578  dc.SelectFont(m_hFontLink);
1579  RECT rcLink = rcClient;
1580  if(lpstrLeft != NULL)
1581  rcLink.left = rcLeft.right;
1582  dc.DrawText(lpstrLink, cchLink, &rcLink, DT_LEFT | uFormat | DT_CALCRECT);
1583 
1584  dc.SelectFont(hFontOld);
1585 
1586  m_rcLink = rcLink;
1587  }
1588  else
1589  {
1590  HFONT hOldFont = NULL;
1591  if(m_hFontLink != NULL)
1592  hOldFont = dc.SelectFont(m_hFontLink);
1593  LPTSTR lpstrText = (m_lpstrLabel != NULL) ? m_lpstrLabel : m_lpstrHyperLink;
1594  DWORD dwStyle = GetStyle();
1595  UINT uFormat = DT_LEFT;
1596  if (dwStyle & SS_CENTER)
1597  uFormat = DT_CENTER;
1598  else if (dwStyle & SS_RIGHT)
1599  uFormat = DT_RIGHT;
1600  uFormat |= IsSingleLine() ? DT_SINGLELINE : DT_WORDBREAK;
1601  dc.DrawText(lpstrText, -1, &m_rcLink, uFormat | DT_CALCRECT);
1602  if(m_hFontLink != NULL)
1603  dc.SelectFont(hOldFont);
1604  if (dwStyle & SS_CENTER)
1605  {
1606  int dx = (rcClient.right - m_rcLink.right) / 2;
1607  ::OffsetRect(&m_rcLink, dx, 0);
1608  }
1609  else if (dwStyle & SS_RIGHT)
1610  {
1611  int dx = rcClient.right - m_rcLink.right;
1612  ::OffsetRect(&m_rcLink, dx, 0);
1613  }
1614  }
1615 
1616  return true;
1617  }
1618 
1619  void CalcLabelParts(LPTSTR& lpstrLeft, int& cchLeft, LPTSTR& lpstrLink, int& cchLink, LPTSTR& lpstrRight, int& cchRight) const
1620  {
1621  lpstrLeft = NULL;
1622  cchLeft = 0;
1623  lpstrLink = NULL;
1624  cchLink = 0;
1625  lpstrRight = NULL;
1626  cchRight = 0;
1627 
1628  LPTSTR lpstrText = (m_lpstrLabel != NULL) ? m_lpstrLabel : m_lpstrHyperLink;
1629  int cchText = lstrlen(lpstrText);
1630  bool bOutsideLink = true;
1631  for(int i = 0; i < cchText; i++)
1632  {
1633  if(lpstrText[i] != _T('<'))
1634  continue;
1635 
1636  if(bOutsideLink)
1637  {
1638  if(::CompareString(LOCALE_USER_DEFAULT, NORM_IGNORECASE, &lpstrText[i], 3, _T("<A>"), 3) == CSTR_EQUAL)
1639  {
1640  if(i > 0)
1641  {
1642  lpstrLeft = lpstrText;
1643  cchLeft = i;
1644  }
1645  lpstrLink = &lpstrText[i + 3];
1646  bOutsideLink = false;
1647  }
1648  }
1649  else
1650  {
1651  if(::CompareString(LOCALE_USER_DEFAULT, NORM_IGNORECASE, &lpstrText[i], 4, _T("</A>"), 4) == CSTR_EQUAL)
1652  {
1653  cchLink = i - 3 - cchLeft;
1654  if(lpstrText[i + 4] != 0)
1655  {
1656  lpstrRight = &lpstrText[i + 4];
1657  cchRight = cchText - (i + 4);
1658  break;
1659  }
1660  }
1661  }
1662  }
1663 
1664  }
1665 
1666  void DoEraseBackground(CDCHandle dc)
1667  {
1668  HBRUSH hBrush = (HBRUSH)::SendMessage(GetParent(), WM_CTLCOLORSTATIC, (WPARAM)dc.m_hDC, (LPARAM)m_hWnd);
1669  if(hBrush != NULL)
1670  {
1671  RECT rect = { 0 };
1672  GetClientRect(&rect);
1673  dc.FillRect(&rect, hBrush);
1674  }
1675  }
1676 
1677  void DoPaint(CDCHandle dc)
1678  {
1679  if(IsUsingTags())
1680  {
1681  // find tags and label parts
1682  LPTSTR lpstrLeft = NULL;
1683  int cchLeft = 0;
1684  LPTSTR lpstrLink = NULL;
1685  int cchLink = 0;
1686  LPTSTR lpstrRight = NULL;
1687  int cchRight = 0;
1688 
1689  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
1690  pT->CalcLabelParts(lpstrLeft, cchLeft, lpstrLink, cchLink, lpstrRight, cchRight);
1691 
1692  // get label part rects
1693  RECT rcClient = { 0 };
1694  GetClientRect(&rcClient);
1695 
1696  dc.SetBkMode(TRANSPARENT);
1697  HFONT hFontOld = dc.SelectFont(m_hFontNormal);
1698 
1699  UINT uFormat = IsSingleLine() ? DT_SINGLELINE : DT_WORDBREAK;
1700 
1701  if(lpstrLeft != NULL)
1702  dc.DrawText(lpstrLeft, cchLeft, &rcClient, DT_LEFT | uFormat);
1703 
1704  COLORREF clrOld = dc.SetTextColor(IsWindowEnabled() ? (m_bVisited ? m_clrVisited : m_clrLink) : (::GetSysColor(COLOR_GRAYTEXT)));
1705  if(m_hFontLink != NULL && (!IsUnderlineHover() || (IsUnderlineHover() && m_bHover)))
1706  dc.SelectFont(m_hFontLink);
1707  else
1708  dc.SelectFont(m_hFontNormal);
1709 
1710  dc.DrawText(lpstrLink, cchLink, &m_rcLink, DT_LEFT | uFormat);
1711 
1712  dc.SetTextColor(clrOld);
1713  dc.SelectFont(m_hFontNormal);
1714  if(lpstrRight != NULL)
1715  {
1716  RECT rcRight = { m_rcLink.right, m_rcLink.top, rcClient.right, rcClient.bottom };
1717  dc.DrawText(lpstrRight, cchRight, &rcRight, DT_LEFT | uFormat);
1718  }
1719 
1720  if(GetFocus() == m_hWnd)
1721  dc.DrawFocusRect(&m_rcLink);
1722 
1723  dc.SelectFont(hFontOld);
1724  }
1725  else
1726  {
1727  dc.SetBkMode(TRANSPARENT);
1728  COLORREF clrOld = dc.SetTextColor(IsWindowEnabled() ? (m_bVisited ? m_clrVisited : m_clrLink) : (::GetSysColor(COLOR_GRAYTEXT)));
1729 
1730  HFONT hFontOld = NULL;
1731  if(m_hFontLink != NULL && (!IsUnderlineHover() || (IsUnderlineHover() && m_bHover)))
1732  hFontOld = dc.SelectFont(m_hFontLink);
1733  else
1734  hFontOld = dc.SelectFont(m_hFontNormal);
1735 
1736  LPTSTR lpstrText = (m_lpstrLabel != NULL) ? m_lpstrLabel : m_lpstrHyperLink;
1737 
1738  DWORD dwStyle = GetStyle();
1739  UINT uFormat = DT_LEFT;
1740  if (dwStyle & SS_CENTER)
1741  uFormat = DT_CENTER;
1742  else if (dwStyle & SS_RIGHT)
1743  uFormat = DT_RIGHT;
1744  uFormat |= IsSingleLine() ? DT_SINGLELINE : DT_WORDBREAK;
1745 
1746  dc.DrawText(lpstrText, -1, &m_rcLink, uFormat);
1747 
1748  if(GetFocus() == m_hWnd)
1749  dc.DrawFocusRect(&m_rcLink);
1750 
1751  dc.SetTextColor(clrOld);
1752  dc.SelectFont(hFontOld);
1753  }
1754  }

1762  tme.hwndTrack = m_hWnd;
1763  return _TrackMouseEvent(&tme);
1764  }

1786  }

1806  }

1811  }

1816  }

1827 // CWaitCursor - displays a wait cursor
1828 
1829 class CWaitCursor
1830 {
1831 public:
1832 // Data
1833  HCURSOR m_hWaitCursor;
1834  HCURSOR m_hOldCursor;
1835  bool m_bInUse;
1836 
1837 // Constructor/destructor
1838  CWaitCursor(bool bSet = true, LPCTSTR lpstrCursor = IDC_WAIT, bool bSys = true) : m_hOldCursor(NULL), m_bInUse(false)
1839  {
1840  HINSTANCE hInstance = bSys ? NULL : ModuleHelper::GetResourceInstance();
1841  m_hWaitCursor = ::LoadCursor(hInstance, lpstrCursor);
1842  ATLASSERT(m_hWaitCursor != NULL);
1843 
1844  if(bSet)
1845  Set();
1846  }
1847 
1848  ~CWaitCursor()
1849  {
1850  Restore();
1851  }
1852 
1853 // Methods
1854  bool Set()
1855  {
1856  if(m_bInUse)
1857  return false;
1858  m_hOldCursor = ::SetCursor(m_hWaitCursor);
1859  m_bInUse = true;
1860  return true;
1861  }
1862 
1863  bool Restore()
1864  {
1865  if(!m_bInUse)
1866  return false;
1867  ::SetCursor(m_hOldCursor);
1868  m_bInUse = false;
1869  return true;
1870  }
1871 };

1904

1906 class ATL_NO_VTABLE CMultiPaneStatusBarCtrlImpl : public ATL::CWindowImpl< T, TBase >
1907 {

1909  DECLARE_WND_SUPERCLASS(NULL, TBase::GetWndClassName())
1910 
1911 // Data
1912  enum { m_cxPaneMargin = 3 };
1913 
1914  int m_nPanes;
1915  int* m_pPane;
1916

1918  CMultiPaneStatusBarCtrlImpl() : m_nPanes(0), m_pPane(NULL)
1919  { }
1920

1924  }
1925 
1926 // Methods
1927  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, LPCTSTR lpstrText, DWORD dwStyle = WS_CHILD | WS_VISIBLE | WS_CLIPCHILDREN | WS_CLIPSIBLINGS | SBARS_SIZEGRIP, UINT nID = ATL_IDW_STATUS_BAR)
1928  {

1931 #else // !(_MSC_VER >= 1300)

1936 
1937  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, UINT nTextID = ATL_IDS_IDLEMESSAGE, DWORD dwStyle = WS_CHILD | WS_VISIBLE | WS_CLIPCHILDREN | WS_CLIPSIBLINGS | SBARS_SIZEGRIP, UINT nID = ATL_IDW_STATUS_BAR)
1938  {
1939  const int cchMax = 128; // max text length is 127 for status bars (+1 for null)
1940  TCHAR szText[cchMax];
1941  szText[0] = 0;
1942  ::LoadString(ModuleHelper::GetResourceInstance(), nTextID, szText, cchMax);
1943  return Create(hWndParent, szText, dwStyle, nID);
1944  }
1945 
1946  BOOL SetPanes(int* pPanes, int nPanes, bool bSetText = true)
1947  {
1948  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
1949  ATLASSERT(nPanes > 0);
1950 
1951  m_nPanes = nPanes;
1952  delete [] m_pPane;
1953  m_pPane = NULL;
1954 
1955  ATLTRY(m_pPane = new int[nPanes]);
1956  ATLASSERT(m_pPane != NULL);
1957  if(m_pPane == NULL)
1958  return FALSE;
1959 
1960  CTempBuffer<int, _WTL_STACK_ALLOC_THRESHOLD> buff;
1961  int* pPanesPos = buff.Allocate(nPanes);
1962  ATLASSERT(pPanesPos != NULL);
1963  if(pPanesPos == NULL)
1964  return FALSE;
1965 
1966  SecureHelper::memcpy_x(m_pPane, nPanes * sizeof(int), pPanes, nPanes * sizeof(int));
1967 
1968  // get status bar DC and set font
1969  CClientDC dc(m_hWnd);
1970  HFONT hOldFont = dc.SelectFont(GetFont());
1971 
1972  // get status bar borders
1973  int arrBorders[3] = { 0 };
1974  GetBorders(arrBorders);
1975 
1976  const int cchBuff = 128;
1977  TCHAR szBuff[cchBuff] = { 0 };
1978  SIZE size = { 0, 0 };
1979  int cxLeft = arrBorders[0];
1980 
1981  // calculate right edge of each part
1982  for(int i = 0; i < nPanes; i++)
1983  {
1984  if(pPanes[i] == ID_DEFAULT_PANE)
1985  {
1986  // make very large, will be resized later
1987  pPanesPos[i] = INT_MAX / 2;
1988  }
1989  else
1990  {
1991  ::LoadString(ModuleHelper::GetResourceInstance(), pPanes[i], szBuff, cchBuff);
1992  dc.GetTextExtent(szBuff, lstrlen(szBuff), &size);
1993  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
1994  pT;
1995  pPanesPos[i] = cxLeft + size.cx + arrBorders[2] + 2 * pT->m_cxPaneMargin;
1996  }
1997  cxLeft = pPanesPos[i];
1998  }
1999 
2000  BOOL bRet = SetParts(nPanes, pPanesPos);
2001 
2002  if(bRet && bSetText)
2003  {
2004  for(int i = 0; i < nPanes; i++)
2005  {
2006  if(pPanes[i] != ID_DEFAULT_PANE)
2007  {
2008  ::LoadString(ModuleHelper::GetResourceInstance(), pPanes[i], szBuff, cchBuff);
2009  SetPaneText(m_pPane[i], szBuff);
2010  }
2011  }
2012  }
2013 
2014  dc.SelectFont(hOldFont);
2015  return bRet;
2016  }
2017 
2018  bool GetPaneTextLength(int nPaneID, int* pcchLength = NULL, int* pnType = NULL) const
2019  {
2020  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
2021  int nIndex = GetPaneIndexFromID(nPaneID);
2022  if(nIndex == -1)
2023  return false;
2024 
2025  int nLength = GetTextLength(nIndex, pnType);
2026  if(pcchLength != NULL)
2027  *pcchLength = nLength;
2028 
2029  return true;
2030  }
2031

2033  {

2035  int nIndex = GetPaneIndexFromID(nPaneID);

2037  return FALSE;

2040  if(pcchLength != NULL)
2041  *pcchLength = nLength;
2042 
2043  return TRUE;
2044  }

2056  BOOL GetPaneRect(int nPaneID, LPRECT lpRect) const
2057  {
2058  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));

2061  return FALSE;

2064  }
2065 
2066  BOOL SetPaneWidth(int nPaneID, int cxWidth)
2067  {
2068  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
2069  ATLASSERT(nPaneID != ID_DEFAULT_PANE); // Can't resize this one
2070  int nIndex = GetPaneIndexFromID(nPaneID);
2071  if(nIndex == -1)
2072  return FALSE;
2073 
2074  // get pane positions
2075  CTempBuffer<int, _WTL_STACK_ALLOC_THRESHOLD> buff;
2076  int* pPanesPos = buff.Allocate(m_nPanes);
2077  if(pPanesPos == NULL)
2078  return FALSE;
2079  GetParts(m_nPanes, pPanesPos);
2080  // calculate offset
2081  int cxPaneWidth = pPanesPos[nIndex] - ((nIndex == 0) ? 0 : pPanesPos[nIndex - 1]);
2082  int cxOff = cxWidth - cxPaneWidth;
2083  // find variable width pane
2084  int nDef = m_nPanes;
2085  for(int i = 0; i < m_nPanes; i++)
2086  {
2087  if(m_pPane[i] == ID_DEFAULT_PANE)
2088  {
2089  nDef = i;
2090  break;
2091  }
2092  }
2093  // resize
2094  if(nIndex < nDef) // before default pane
2095  {
2096  for(int i = nIndex; i < nDef; i++)
2097  pPanesPos[i] += cxOff;
2098 
2099  }
2100  else // after default one
2101  {
2102  for(int i = nDef; i < nIndex; i++)
2103  pPanesPos[i] -= cxOff;
2104  }
2105  // set pane postions
2106  return SetParts(m_nPanes, pPanesPos);
2107  }
2108 
2109 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
2110  BOOL GetPaneTipText(int nPaneID, LPTSTR lpstrText, int nSize) const
2111  {

2115  return FALSE;
2116

2118  return TRUE;
2119  }

2127

2156 // Message map and handlers
2157  BEGIN_MSG_MAP(CMultiPaneStatusBarCtrlImpl< T >)
2158  MESSAGE_HANDLER(WM_SIZE, OnSize)
2159  END_MSG_MAP()
2160 
2161  LRESULT OnSize(UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
2162  {
2163  LRESULT lRet = DefWindowProc(uMsg, wParam, lParam);
2164  if(wParam != SIZE_MINIMIZED && m_nPanes > 0)
2165  {
2166  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
2167  pT->UpdatePanesLayout();
2168  }
2169  return lRet;
2170  }
2171 
2172 // Implementation
2173  BOOL UpdatePanesLayout()
2174  {
2175  // get pane positions
2176  CTempBuffer<int, _WTL_STACK_ALLOC_THRESHOLD> buff;
2177  int* pPanesPos = buff.Allocate(m_nPanes);
2178  ATLASSERT(pPanesPos != NULL);
2179  if(pPanesPos == NULL)
2180  return FALSE;
2181  int nRet = GetParts(m_nPanes, pPanesPos);
2182  ATLASSERT(nRet == m_nPanes);
2183  if(nRet != m_nPanes)
2184  return FALSE;
2185  // calculate offset
2186  RECT rcClient = { 0 };
2187  GetClientRect(&rcClient);
2188  int cxOff = rcClient.right - pPanesPos[m_nPanes - 1];
2189 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
2190  // Move panes left if size grip box is present
2191  if((GetStyle() & SBARS_SIZEGRIP) != 0)
2192  cxOff -= ::GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXVSCROLL) + ::GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXEDGE);
2193 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
2194  // find variable width pane
2195  int i;
2196  for(i = 0; i < m_nPanes; i++)
2197  {
2198  if(m_pPane[i] == ID_DEFAULT_PANE)
2199  break;
2200  }
2201  // resize all panes from the variable one to the right
2202  if((i < m_nPanes) && (pPanesPos[i] + cxOff) > ((i == 0) ? 0 : pPanesPos[i - 1]))
2203  {
2204  for(; i < m_nPanes; i++)
2205  pPanesPos[i] += cxOff;
2206  }
2207  // set pane postions
2208  return SetParts(m_nPanes, pPanesPos);
2209  }
2210 
2211  int GetPaneIndexFromID(int nPaneID) const
2212  {
2213  for(int i = 0; i < m_nPanes; i++)
2214  {
2215  if(m_pPane[i] == nPaneID)
2216  return i;
2217  }
2218 
2219  return -1; // not found
2220  }
2221 };

2290  DWORD SetPaneContainerExtendedStyle(DWORD dwExtendedStyle, DWORD dwMask = 0)
2291  {
2292  DWORD dwPrevStyle = m_dwExtendedStyle;
2293  if(dwMask == 0)
2294  m_dwExtendedStyle = dwExtendedStyle;
2295  else
2296  m_dwExtendedStyle = (m_dwExtendedStyle & ~dwMask) | (dwExtendedStyle & dwMask);
2297  if(m_hWnd != NULL)
2298  {
2299  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
2300  bool bUpdate = false;
2301 
2302  if(((dwPrevStyle & PANECNT_NOCLOSEBUTTON) != 0) && ((m_dwExtendedStyle & PANECNT_NOCLOSEBUTTON) == 0)) // add close button
2303  {
2304  pT->CreateCloseButton();
2305  bUpdate = true;
2306  }
2307  else if(((dwPrevStyle & PANECNT_NOCLOSEBUTTON) == 0) && ((m_dwExtendedStyle & PANECNT_NOCLOSEBUTTON) != 0)) // remove close button
2308  {
2309  pT->DestroyCloseButton();
2310  bUpdate = true;
2311  }
2312 
2313  if((dwPrevStyle & PANECNT_VERTICAL) != (m_dwExtendedStyle & PANECNT_VERTICAL)) // change orientation
2314  {
2315  pT->CalcSize();
2316  bUpdate = true;
2317  }
2318 
2319  if((dwPrevStyle & (PANECNT_FLATBORDER | PANECNT_NOBORDER)) !=
2320  (m_dwExtendedStyle & (PANECNT_FLATBORDER | PANECNT_NOBORDER))) // change border
2321  {
2322  bUpdate = true;
2323  }
2324 
2325  if(bUpdate)
2326  pT->UpdateLayout();
2327  }
2328  return dwPrevStyle;
2329  }

2438  LRESULT OnCreate(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
2439  {
2440  if(m_hFont == NULL)
2441  {
2442  // The same as AtlCreateControlFont() for horizontal pane
2443 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
2444  LOGFONT lf = { 0 };
2445  ATLVERIFY(::SystemParametersInfo(SPI_GETICONTITLELOGFONT, sizeof(LOGFONT), &lf, 0) != FALSE);
2446  if(IsVertical())
2447  lf.lfEscapement = 900; // 90 degrees
2448  m_hFont = ::CreateFontIndirect(&lf);
2449 #else // CE specific
2450  m_hFont = (HFONT)::GetStockObject(SYSTEM_FONT);
2451  if(IsVertical())
2452  {
2453  CLogFont lf(m_hFont);
2454  lf.lfEscapement = 900; // 90 degrees
2455  m_hFont = ::CreateFontIndirect(&lf);
2456  }
2457 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
2458  m_bInternalFont = true;
2459  }
2460 
2461  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
2462  pT->CalcSize();
2463 
2464  if((m_dwExtendedStyle & PANECNT_NOCLOSEBUTTON) == 0)

2547  LRESULT OnNotify(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& bHandled)
2548  {
2549  if(m_tb.m_hWnd == NULL)
2550  {
2551  bHandled = FALSE;
2552  return 1;
2553  }
2554 
2555  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
2556  pT;
2557  LPNMHDR lpnmh = (LPNMHDR)lParam;
2558  LRESULT lRet = 0;
2559 
2560  // pass toolbar custom draw notifications to the base class
2561  if(lpnmh->code == NM_CUSTOMDRAW && lpnmh->hwndFrom == m_tb.m_hWnd)
2562  lRet = CCustomDraw< T >::OnCustomDraw(0, lpnmh, bHandled);
2563 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
2564  // tooltip notifications come with the tooltip window handle and button ID,
2565  // pass them to the parent if we don't handle them
2566  else if(lpnmh->code == TTN_GETDISPINFO && lpnmh->idFrom == pT->m_nCloseBtnID)
2567  bHandled = pT->GetToolTipText(lpnmh);
2568 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
2569  // only let notifications not from the toolbar go to the parent
2570  else if(lpnmh->hwndFrom != m_tb.m_hWnd && lpnmh->idFrom != pT->m_nCloseBtnID)
2571  bHandled = FALSE;
2572 
2573  return lRet;
2574  }

2576  LRESULT OnCommand(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& bHandled)
2577  {
2578  // if command comes from the close button, substitute HWND of the pane container instead
2579  if(m_tb.m_hWnd != NULL && (HWND)lParam == m_tb.m_hWnd)
2580  return ::SendMessage(GetParent(), WM_COMMAND, wParam, (LPARAM)m_hWnd);
2581 
2582  bHandled = FALSE;
2583  return 1;
2584  }

2644 // Implementation - overrideable methods
2645  void UpdateLayout(int cxWidth, int cyHeight)
2646  {
2647  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
2648  RECT rect = { 0 };
2649 
2650  if(IsVertical())
2651  {
2652  ::SetRect(&rect, 0, 0, m_cxyHeader, cyHeight);
2653  if(m_tb.m_hWnd != NULL)
2654  m_tb.SetWindowPos(NULL, m_cxyBorder, m_cxyBorder + m_cxyBtnOffset, 0, 0, SWP_NOZORDER | SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_NOACTIVATE);
2655 
2656  if(m_wndClient.m_hWnd != NULL)
2657  m_wndClient.SetWindowPos(NULL, m_cxyHeader, 0, cxWidth - m_cxyHeader, cyHeight, SWP_NOZORDER);
2658  else
2659  rect.right = cxWidth;
2660  }
2661  else
2662  {
2663  ::SetRect(&rect, 0, 0, cxWidth, m_cxyHeader);
2664  if(m_tb.m_hWnd != NULL)
2665  m_tb.SetWindowPos(NULL, rect.right - m_cxToolBar, m_cxyBorder + m_cxyBtnOffset, 0, 0, SWP_NOZORDER | SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_NOACTIVATE);
2666 
2667  if(m_wndClient.m_hWnd != NULL)
2668  m_wndClient.SetWindowPos(NULL, 0, m_cxyHeader, cxWidth, cyHeight - m_cxyHeader, SWP_NOZORDER);
2669  else
2670  rect.bottom = cyHeight;
2671  }
2672 
2673  InvalidateRect(&rect);
2674  }

2712  void CalcSize()
2713  {
2714  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
2715  CFontHandle font = pT->GetTitleFont();
2716  if(font.IsNull())
2717  font = (HFONT)::GetStockObject(SYSTEM_FONT);

2719  font.GetLogFont(lf);
2720  if(IsVertical())
2721  {
2722  m_cxyHeader = m_cxImageTB + m_cxyBtnAddTB + m_cxyBorder;
2723  }
2724  else
2725  {
2726  int cyFont = abs(lf.lfHeight) + m_cxyBorder + 2 * m_cxyTextOffset;
2727  int cyBtn = m_cyImageTB + m_cxyBtnAddTB + m_cxyBorder + 2 * m_cxyBtnOffset;
2728  m_cxyHeader = max(cyFont, cyBtn);
2729  }
2730  }

2744  void DrawPaneTitle(CDCHandle dc)
2745  {
2746  RECT rect = { 0 };
2747  GetClientRect(&rect);
2748 
2749  UINT uBorder = BF_LEFT | BF_TOP | BF_ADJUST;
2750  if(IsVertical())
2751  {
2752  rect.right = rect.left + m_cxyHeader;
2753  uBorder |= BF_BOTTOM;
2754  }
2755  else
2756  {
2757  rect.bottom = rect.top + m_cxyHeader;
2758  uBorder |= BF_RIGHT;
2759  }
2760 
2761  if((m_dwExtendedStyle & PANECNT_NOBORDER) == 0)
2762  {
2763  if((m_dwExtendedStyle & PANECNT_FLATBORDER) != 0)
2764  uBorder |= BF_FLAT;
2765  dc.DrawEdge(&rect, EDGE_ETCHED, uBorder);
2766  }
2767  dc.FillRect(&rect, COLOR_3DFACE);
2768 
2769  // draw title text
2770  dc.SetTextColor(::GetSysColor(COLOR_WINDOWTEXT));
2771  dc.SetBkMode(TRANSPARENT);
2772  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
2773  HFONT hFontOld = dc.SelectFont(pT->GetTitleFont());
2774 #ifdef _WIN32_WCE
2775  const UINT DT_END_ELLIPSIS = 0;
2776 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
2777 
2778  if(IsVertical())
2779  {
2780  rect.top += m_cxyTextOffset;
2781  rect.bottom -= m_cxyTextOffset;
2782  if(m_tb.m_hWnd != NULL)
2783  rect.top += m_cxToolBar;;
2784 
2785  RECT rcCalc = { rect.left, rect.bottom, rect.right, rect.top };
2786  int cxFont = dc.DrawText(m_szTitle, -1, &rcCalc, DT_TOP | DT_SINGLELINE | DT_END_ELLIPSIS | DT_CALCRECT);
2787  RECT rcText = { 0 };
2788  rcText.left = (rect.right - rect.left - cxFont) / 2;
2789  rcText.right = rcText.left + (rect.bottom - rect.top);
2790  rcText.top = rect.bottom;
2791  rcText.bottom = rect.top;
2792  dc.DrawText(m_szTitle, -1, &rcText, DT_TOP | DT_SINGLELINE | DT_END_ELLIPSIS);
2793  }
2794  else
2795  {
2796  rect.left += m_cxyTextOffset;
2797  rect.right -= m_cxyTextOffset;
2798  if(m_tb.m_hWnd != NULL)
2799  rect.right -= m_cxToolBar;;
2800 
2801  dc.DrawText(m_szTitle, -1, &rect, DT_LEFT | DT_SINGLELINE | DT_VCENTER | DT_END_ELLIPSIS);
2802  }
2803 
2804  dc.SelectFont(hFontOld);
2805  }
2806 
2807  // called only if pane is empty
2808  void DrawPane(CDCHandle dc)
2809  {
2810  RECT rect = { 0 };
2811  GetClientRect(&rect);
2812  if(IsVertical())
2813  rect.left += m_cxyHeader;
2814  else
2815  rect.top += m_cxyHeader;
2816  if((GetExStyle() & WS_EX_CLIENTEDGE) == 0)
2817  dc.DrawEdge(&rect, EDGE_SUNKEN, BF_RECT | BF_ADJUST);
2818  dc.FillRect(&rect, COLOR_APPWORKSPACE);
2819  }
2820 
2821  // drawing helper - draws "x" button image
2822  void DrawButtonImage(CDCHandle dc, RECT& rcImage, HPEN hPen)
2823  {
2824 #if !defined(_WIN32_WCE) || (_WIN32_WCE >= 400)
2825  HPEN hPenOld = dc.SelectPen(hPen);
2826 
2827  dc.MoveTo(rcImage.left, rcImage.top);
2828  dc.LineTo(rcImage.right, rcImage.bottom);
2829  dc.MoveTo(rcImage.left + 1, rcImage.top);
2830  dc.LineTo(rcImage.right + 1, rcImage.bottom);
2831 
2832  dc.MoveTo(rcImage.left, rcImage.bottom - 1);
2833  dc.LineTo(rcImage.right, rcImage.top - 1);
2834  dc.MoveTo(rcImage.left + 1, rcImage.bottom - 1);
2835  dc.LineTo(rcImage.right + 1, rcImage.top - 1);
2836 
2837  dc.SelectPen(hPenOld);
2838 #else // (_WIN32_WCE < 400)
2839  rcImage;
2840  hPen;
2841  // no support for the "x" button image
2842 #endif // (_WIN32_WCE < 400)
2843  }

2846  {

2859 // CSortListViewCtrl - implements sorting for a listview control
2860 
2861 // sort listview extended styles
2862 #define SORTLV_USESHELLBITMAPS 0x00000001
2863 
2864 // Notification sent to parent when sort column is changed by user clicking header.
2865 #define SLVN_SORTCHANGED LVN_LAST
2866 
2867 // A LPNMSORTLISTVIEW is sent with the SLVN_SORTCHANGED notification
2868 typedef struct tagNMSORTLISTVIEW
2869 {
2870  NMHDR hdr;
2871  int iNewSortColumn;
2872  int iOldSortColumn;
2873 } NMSORTLISTVIEW, *LPNMSORTLISTVIEW;
2874 
2875 // Column sort types. Can be set on a per-column basis with the SetColumnSortType method.
2876 enum
2877 {
2878  LVCOLSORT_NONE,
2879  LVCOLSORT_TEXT, // default
2880  LVCOLSORT_TEXTNOCASE,
2881  LVCOLSORT_LONG,
2882  LVCOLSORT_DOUBLE,
2883  LVCOLSORT_DECIMAL,
2884  LVCOLSORT_DATETIME,
2885  LVCOLSORT_DATE,
2886  LVCOLSORT_TIME,
2887  LVCOLSORT_CUSTOM,
2888  LVCOLSORT_LAST = LVCOLSORT_CUSTOM
2889 };
2890 
2891 
2892 template <class T>
2893 class CSortListViewImpl
2894 {
2895 public:
2896  enum
2897  {
2898  m_cchCmpTextMax = 32, // overrideable
2899  m_cxSortImage = 16,
2900  m_cySortImage = 15,
2901  m_cxSortArrow = 11,
2902  m_cySortArrow = 6,
2903  m_iSortUp = 0, // index of sort bitmaps
2904  m_iSortDown = 1,
2905  m_nShellSortUpID = 133
2906  };
2907 
2908  // passed to LVCompare functions as lParam1 and lParam2
2909  struct LVCompareParam
2910  {
2911  int iItem;
2912  DWORD_PTR dwItemData;
2913  union
2914  {
2915  long lValue;
2916  double dblValue;
2917  DECIMAL decValue;
2918  LPCTSTR pszValue;
2919  };
2920  };
2921 
2922  // passed to LVCompare functions as the lParamSort parameter
2923  struct LVSortInfo
2924  {
2925  T* pT;
2926  int iSortCol;
2927  bool bDescending;
2928  };
2929 
2930  bool m_bSortDescending;
2931  bool m_bCommCtrl6;
2932  int m_iSortColumn;
2933  CBitmap m_bmSort[2];
2934  int m_fmtOldSortCol;
2935  HBITMAP m_hbmOldSortCol;
2936  DWORD m_dwSortLVExtendedStyle;
2937  ATL::CSimpleArray<WORD> m_arrColSortType;
2938  bool m_bUseWaitCursor;
2939 
2940  CSortListViewImpl() :
2941  m_bSortDescending(false),
2942  m_bCommCtrl6(false),
2943  m_iSortColumn(-1),
2944  m_fmtOldSortCol(0),
2945  m_hbmOldSortCol(NULL),
2946  m_dwSortLVExtendedStyle(SORTLV_USESHELLBITMAPS),
2947  m_bUseWaitCursor(true)
2948  {
2949 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
2950  DWORD dwMajor = 0;
2951  DWORD dwMinor = 0;
2952  HRESULT hRet = ATL::AtlGetCommCtrlVersion(&dwMajor, &dwMinor);
2953  m_bCommCtrl6 = SUCCEEDED(hRet) && dwMajor >= 6;
2954 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
2955  }
2956 
2957 // Attributes
2958  void SetSortColumn(int iCol)
2959  {
2960  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
2961  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
2962  CHeaderCtrl header = pT->GetHeader();
2963  ATLASSERT(header.m_hWnd != NULL);
2964  ATLASSERT(iCol >= -1 && iCol < m_arrColSortType.GetSize());
2965 
2966  int iOldSortCol = m_iSortColumn;
2967  m_iSortColumn = iCol;
2968  if(m_bCommCtrl6)
2969  {
2970 #ifndef HDF_SORTUP
2971  const int HDF_SORTUP = 0x0400;
2972 #endif // HDF_SORTUP
2973 #ifndef HDF_SORTDOWN
2974  const int HDF_SORTDOWN = 0x0200;
2975 #endif // HDF_SORTDOWN
2976  const int nMask = HDF_SORTUP | HDF_SORTDOWN;
2977  HDITEM hditem = { HDI_FORMAT };
2978  if(iOldSortCol != iCol && iOldSortCol >= 0 && header.GetItem(iOldSortCol, &hditem))
2979  {
2980  hditem.fmt &= ~nMask;
2981  header.SetItem(iOldSortCol, &hditem);
2982  }
2983  if(iCol >= 0 && header.GetItem(iCol, &hditem))
2984  {
2985  hditem.fmt &= ~nMask;
2986  hditem.fmt |= m_bSortDescending ? HDF_SORTDOWN : HDF_SORTUP;
2987  header.SetItem(iCol, &hditem);
2988  }
2989  return;
2990  }
2991 
2992  if(m_bmSort[m_iSortUp].IsNull())
2993  pT->CreateSortBitmaps();
2994 
2995  // restore previous sort column's bitmap, if any, and format
2996  HDITEM hditem = { HDI_BITMAP | HDI_FORMAT };
2997  if(iOldSortCol != iCol && iOldSortCol >= 0)
2998  {
2999  hditem.hbm = m_hbmOldSortCol;
3000  hditem.fmt = m_fmtOldSortCol;
3001  header.SetItem(iOldSortCol, &hditem);
3002  }
3003 
3004  // save new sort column's bitmap and format, and add our sort bitmap
3005  if(iCol >= 0 && header.GetItem(iCol, &hditem))
3006  {
3007  if(iOldSortCol != iCol)
3008  {
3009  m_fmtOldSortCol = hditem.fmt;
3010  m_hbmOldSortCol = hditem.hbm;
3011  }
3012  hditem.fmt &= ~HDF_IMAGE;
3013  hditem.fmt |= HDF_BITMAP | HDF_BITMAP_ON_RIGHT;
3014  int i = m_bSortDescending ? m_iSortDown : m_iSortUp;
3015  hditem.hbm = m_bmSort[i];
3016  header.SetItem(iCol, &hditem);
3017  }
3018  }
3019 
3020  int GetSortColumn() const
3021  {
3022  return m_iSortColumn;
3023  }

3030  }

3456  {
3457  ATLASSERT(lParam1 != NULL && lParam2 != NULL && lParamSort != NULL);
3458

3464  nRet--;

3467 #else
3468  // Compare mantissas, ignore sign and scale
3469  static int CompareMantissas(const DECIMAL& decLeft, const DECIMAL& decRight)
3470  {
3471  if (decLeft.Hi32 < decRight.Hi32)
3472  {
3473  return -1;
3474  }
3475  if (decLeft.Hi32 > decRight.Hi32)
3476  {
3477  return 1;
3478  }
3479  // Here, decLeft.Hi32 == decRight.Hi32
3480  if (decLeft.Lo64 < decRight.Lo64)
3481  {
3482  return -1;
3483  }
3484  if (decLeft.Lo64 > decRight.Lo64)
3485  {
3486  return 1;
3487  }
3488  return 0;
3489  }
3490 
3491  // return values: VARCMP_LT, VARCMP_EQ, VARCMP_GT, VARCMP_NULL
3492  static HRESULT VarDecCmp(const DECIMAL* pdecLeft, const DECIMAL* pdecRight)
3493  {
3494  static const ULONG powersOfTen[] =
3495  {
3496  10ul,
3497  100ul,
3498  1000ul,
3499  10000ul,
3500  100000ul,
3501  1000000ul,
3502  10000000ul,
3503  100000000ul,
3504  1000000000ul
3505  };
3506  static const int largestPower = sizeof(powersOfTen) / sizeof(powersOfTen[0]);
3507  if (!pdecLeft || !pdecRight)
3508  {
3509  return VARCMP_NULL;
3510  }
3511 
3512  // Degenerate case - at least one comparand is of the form
3513  // [+-]0*10^N (denormalized zero)
3514  bool bLeftZero = (!pdecLeft->Lo64 && !pdecLeft->Hi32);
3515  bool bRightZero = (!pdecRight->Lo64 && !pdecRight->Hi32);
3516  if (bLeftZero && bRightZero)
3517  {
3518  return VARCMP_EQ;
3519  }
3520  bool bLeftNeg = ((pdecLeft->sign & DECIMAL_NEG) != 0);
3521  bool bRightNeg = ((pdecRight->sign & DECIMAL_NEG) != 0);
3522  if (bLeftZero)
3523  {
3524  return (bRightNeg ? VARCMP_GT : VARCMP_LT);
3525  }
3526  // This also covers the case where the comparands have different signs
3527  if (bRightZero || bLeftNeg != bRightNeg)
3528  {
3529  return (bLeftNeg ? VARCMP_LT : VARCMP_GT);
3530  }
3531 
3532  // Here both comparands have the same sign and need to be compared
3533  // on mantissa and scale. The result is obvious when
3534  // 1. Scales are equal (then compare mantissas)
3535  // 2. A number with smaller scale is also the one with larger mantissa
3536  // (then this number is obviously larger)
3537  // In the remaining case, we would multiply the number with smaller
3538  // scale by 10 and simultaneously increment its scale (which amounts to
3539  // adding trailing zeros after decimal point), until the numbers fall under
3540  // one of the two cases above
3541  DECIMAL temp;
3542  bool bInvert = bLeftNeg; // the final result needs to be inverted
3543  if (pdecLeft->scale < pdecRight->scale)
3544  {
3545  temp = *pdecLeft;
3546  }
3547  else
3548  {
3549  temp = *pdecRight;
3550  pdecRight = pdecLeft;
3551  bInvert = !bInvert;
3552  }
3553 
3554  // Now temp is the number with smaller (or equal) scale, and
3555  // we can modify it freely without touching original parameters
3556  int comp;
3557  while ((comp = CompareMantissas(temp, *pdecRight)) < 0 &&
3558  temp.scale < pdecRight->scale)
3559  {
3560  // Multiply by an appropriate power of 10
3561  int scaleDiff = pdecRight->scale - temp.scale;
3562  if (scaleDiff > largestPower)
3563  {
3564  // Keep the multiplier representable in 32bit
3565  scaleDiff = largestPower;
3566  }
3567  DWORDLONG power = powersOfTen[scaleDiff - 1];
3568  // Multiply temp's mantissa by power
3569  DWORDLONG product = temp.Lo32 * power;
3570  ULONG carry = static_cast<ULONG>(product >> 32);
3571  temp.Lo32 = static_cast<ULONG>(product);
3572  product = temp.Mid32 * power + carry;
3573  carry = static_cast<ULONG>(product >> 32);
3574  temp.Mid32 = static_cast<ULONG>(product);
3575  product = temp.Hi32 * power + carry;
3576  if (static_cast<ULONG>(product >> 32))
3577  {
3578  // Multiplication overflowed - pdecLeft is clearly larger
3579  break;
3580  }
3581  temp.Hi32 = static_cast<ULONG>(product);
3582  temp.scale = (BYTE)(temp.scale + scaleDiff);
3583  }
3584  if (temp.scale < pdecRight->scale)
3585  {
3586  comp = 1;
3587  }
3588  if (bInvert)
3589  {
3590  comp = -comp;
3591  }
3592  return (comp > 0 ? VARCMP_GT : comp < 0 ? VARCMP_LT : VARCMP_EQ);
3593  }
3594 
3595  static int CALLBACK LVCompareDecimal(LPARAM lParam1, LPARAM lParam2, LPARAM lParamSort)
3596  {
3597  ATLASSERT(lParam1 != NULL && lParam2 != NULL && lParamSort != NULL);
3598 
3599  LVCompareParam* pParam1 = (LVCompareParam*)lParam1;
3600  LVCompareParam* pParam2 = (LVCompareParam*)lParam2;
3601  LVSortInfo* pInfo = (LVSortInfo*)lParamSort;
3602 
3603  int nRet = (int)VarDecCmp(&pParam1->decValue, &pParam2->decValue);
3604  nRet--;
3605  return pInfo->bDescending ? -nRet : nRet;
3606  }
3607 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE

3618  {
3619  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
3620  LRESULT lRet = pT->DefWindowProc(uMsg, wParam, lParam);
3621  if(lRet == -1)
3622  return -1;
3623 
3624  WORD wType = 0;
3625  m_arrColSortType.Add(wType);
3626  int nCount = m_arrColSortType.GetSize();
3627  ATLASSERT(nCount == GetColumnCount());
3628 
3629  for(int i = nCount - 1; i > lRet; i--)
3630  m_arrColSortType[i] = m_arrColSortType[i - 1];
3631  m_arrColSortType[(int)lRet] = LVCOLSORT_TEXT;
3632 
3633  if(lRet <= m_iSortColumn)
3634  m_iSortColumn++;
3635 
3636  return lRet;
3637  }
3638 
3639  LRESULT OnDeleteColumn(UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
3640  {
3641  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
3642  LRESULT lRet = pT->DefWindowProc(uMsg, wParam, lParam);
3643  if(lRet == 0)
3644  return 0;
3645 
3646  int iCol = (int)wParam;
3647  if(m_iSortColumn == iCol)
3648  m_iSortColumn = -1;
3649  else if(m_iSortColumn > iCol)
3650  m_iSortColumn--;
3651  m_arrColSortType.RemoveAt(iCol);
3652 
3653  return lRet;
3654  }

3663  if(DoSortItems(p->iItem, bDescending))
3664  NotifyParentSortChanged(p->iItem, iOld);
3665  }
3666  bHandled = FALSE;
3667  return 0;
3668  }

3836 // Message filter function - to be called from PreTranslateMessage of the main window
3837  BOOL PreTranslateMessage(MSG* pMsg)
3838  {
3839  if(IsWindow() == FALSE)
3840  return FALSE;
3841 
3842  BOOL bRet = FALSE;
3843 
3844  // Check for TabView built-in accelerators (Ctrl+Tab/Ctrl+Shift+Tab - next/previous page)
3845  int nCount = GetPageCount();
3846  if(nCount > 0)
3847  {
3848  bool bControl = (::GetKeyState(VK_CONTROL) < 0);
3849  if((pMsg->message == WM_KEYDOWN) && (pMsg->wParam == VK_TAB) && bControl)
3850  {
3851  if(nCount > 1)
3852  {
3853  int nPage = m_nActivePage;
3854  bool bShift = (::GetKeyState(VK_SHIFT) < 0);
3855  if(bShift)
3856  nPage = (nPage > 0) ? (nPage - 1) : (nCount - 1);
3857  else
3858  nPage = ((nPage >= 0) && (nPage < (nCount - 1))) ? (nPage + 1) : 0;
3859 
3860  SetActivePage(nPage);
3861  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
3862  pT->OnPageActivated(m_nActivePage);
3863  }
3864 
3865  bRet = TRUE;
3866  }
3867  }
3868 
3869  // If we are doing drag-drop, check for Escape key that cancels it
3870  if(bRet == FALSE)
3871  {
3872  if(m_bTabCapture && pMsg->message == WM_KEYDOWN && pMsg->wParam == VK_ESCAPE)
3873  {
3874  ::ReleaseCapture();
3875  bRet = TRUE;
3876  }
3877  }
3878 
3879  // Pass the message to the active page
3880  if(bRet == FALSE)
3881  {
3882  if(m_nActivePage != -1)
3883  bRet = (BOOL)::SendMessage(GetPageHWND(m_nActivePage), WM_FORWARDMSG, 0, (LPARAM)pMsg);
3884  }
3885 
3886  return bRet;
3887  }

4152  void RemovePage(int nPage)
4153  {
4154  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4155  ATLASSERT(IsValidPageIndex(nPage));
4156 
4157  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
4158 
4159  SetRedraw(FALSE);
4160 
4161  if(GetPageCount() == 1)
4162  pT->ShowTabControl(false);
4163 
4164  if(m_bDestroyPageOnRemove)
4165  ::DestroyWindow(GetPageHWND(nPage));
4166  else
4167  ::ShowWindow(GetPageHWND(nPage), FALSE);
4168  LPTSTR lpstrTitle = (LPTSTR)GetPageTitle(nPage);
4169  delete [] lpstrTitle;
4170 
4171  ATLVERIFY(m_tab.DeleteItem(nPage) != FALSE);
4172 
4173  if(m_nActivePage == nPage)
4174  {
4175  m_nActivePage = -1;
4176 
4177  if(nPage > 0)
4178  {
4179  SetActivePage(nPage - 1);
4180  }
4181  else if(GetPageCount() > 0)
4182  {
4183  SetActivePage(nPage);
4184  }
4185  else
4186  {
4187  SetRedraw(TRUE);
4188  Invalidate();
4189  UpdateWindow();
4190  pT->UpdateTitleBar();
4191  pT->UpdateMenu();
4192  }
4193  }
4194  else
4195  {
4196  nPage = (nPage < m_nActivePage) ? (m_nActivePage - 1) : m_nActivePage;
4197  m_nActivePage = -1;
4198  SetActivePage(nPage);
4199  }
4200 
4201  pT->OnPageActivated(m_nActivePage);
4202  }
4203 
4204  void RemoveAllPages()
4205  {

4207 
4208  if(GetPageCount() == 0)
4209  return;
4210

4218  {

4221  else

4230 
4231  SetRedraw(TRUE);

4234

4255  void BuildWindowMenu(HMENU hMenu, int nMenuItemsCount = 10, bool bEmptyMenuItem = true, bool bWindowsMenuItem = true, bool bActivePageMenuItem = true, bool bActiveAsDefaultMenuItem = false)
4256  {
4257  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4258 
4259  CMenuHandle menu = hMenu;
4260  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
4261  pT; // avoid level 4 warning
4262  int nFirstPos = 0;
4263 
4264  // Find first menu item in our range
4265 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
4266  for(nFirstPos = 0; nFirstPos < menu.GetMenuItemCount(); nFirstPos++)
4267  {
4268  UINT nID = menu.GetMenuItemID(nFirstPos);
4269  if((nID >= ID_WINDOW_TABFIRST && nID <= ID_WINDOW_TABLAST) || nID == ID_WINDOW_SHOWTABLIST)
4270  break;
4271  }
4272 #else // CE specific
4273  for(nFirstPos = 0; ; nFirstPos++)
4274  {
4275  CMenuItemInfo mii;
4276  mii.fMask = MIIM_ID;
4277  BOOL bRet = menu.GetMenuItemInfo(nFirstPos, TRUE, &mii);
4278  if(bRet == FALSE)
4279  break;
4280  if((mii.wID >= ID_WINDOW_TABFIRST && mii.wID <= ID_WINDOW_TABLAST) || mii.wID == ID_WINDOW_SHOWTABLIST)
4281  break;
4282  }
4283 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
4284 
4285  // Remove all menu items for tab pages
4286  BOOL bRet = TRUE;
4287  while(bRet != FALSE)
4288  bRet = menu.DeleteMenu(nFirstPos, MF_BYPOSITION);
4289 
4290  // Add separator if it's not already there
4291  int nPageCount = GetPageCount();
4292  if((bWindowsMenuItem || (nPageCount > 0)) && (nFirstPos > 0))
4293  {
4294  CMenuItemInfo mii;
4295  mii.fMask = MIIM_TYPE;
4296  menu.GetMenuItemInfo(nFirstPos - 1, TRUE, &mii);
4297  if((nFirstPos <= 0) || ((mii.fType & MFT_SEPARATOR) == 0))
4298  {
4299  menu.AppendMenu(MF_SEPARATOR);
4300  nFirstPos++;
4301  }
4302  }
4303 
4304  // Add menu items for all pages
4305  if(nPageCount > 0)
4306  {
4307  // Append menu items for all pages
4308  const int cchPrefix = 3; // 2 digits + space
4309  nMenuItemsCount = min(min(nPageCount, nMenuItemsCount), (int)m_nMenuItemsMax);
4310  ATLASSERT(nMenuItemsCount < 100); // 2 digits only
4311  if(nMenuItemsCount >= 100)
4312  nMenuItemsCount = 99;
4313 
4314  for(int i = 0; i < nMenuItemsCount; i++)
4315  {
4316  LPCTSTR lpstrTitle = GetPageTitle(i);
4317  int nLen = lstrlen(lpstrTitle);
4318  CTempBuffer<TCHAR, _WTL_STACK_ALLOC_THRESHOLD> buff;
4319  LPTSTR lpstrText = buff.Allocate(cchPrefix + nLen + 1);
4320  ATLASSERT(lpstrText != NULL);
4321  if(lpstrText != NULL)
4322  {
4323  LPCTSTR lpstrFormat = (i < 9) ? _T("&%i %s") : _T("%i %s");
4324  SecureHelper::wsprintf_x(lpstrText, cchPrefix + nLen + 1, lpstrFormat, i + 1, lpstrTitle);
4325  menu.AppendMenu(MF_STRING, ID_WINDOW_TABFIRST + i, lpstrText);
4326  }
4327  }
4328 
4329  // Mark active page
4330  if(bActivePageMenuItem && (m_nActivePage != -1))
4331  {
4332 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
4333  if(bActiveAsDefaultMenuItem)
4334  {
4335  menu.SetMenuDefaultItem((UINT)-1, TRUE);
4336  menu.SetMenuDefaultItem(nFirstPos + m_nActivePage, TRUE);
4337  }
4338  else
4339 #else // CE specific
4340  bActiveAsDefaultMenuItem; // avoid level 4 warning
4341 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
4342  {
4343  menu.CheckMenuRadioItem(nFirstPos, nFirstPos + nMenuItemsCount, nFirstPos + m_nActivePage, MF_BYPOSITION);
4344  }
4345  }
4346  }
4347  else
4348  {
4349  if(bEmptyMenuItem)
4350  {
4351  menu.AppendMenu(MF_BYPOSITION | MF_STRING, ID_WINDOW_TABFIRST, pT->GetEmptyListText());
4352  menu.EnableMenuItem(ID_WINDOW_TABFIRST, MF_GRAYED);
4353  }
4354 
4355  // Remove separator if nothing else is there
4356  if(!bEmptyMenuItem && !bWindowsMenuItem && (nFirstPos > 0))
4357  {
4358  CMenuItemInfo mii;
4359  mii.fMask = MIIM_TYPE;
4360  menu.GetMenuItemInfo(nFirstPos - 1, TRUE, &mii);
4361  if((mii.fType & MFT_SEPARATOR) != 0)
4362  menu.DeleteMenu(nFirstPos - 1, MF_BYPOSITION);
4363  }
4364  }
4365 
4366  // Add "Windows..." menu item
4367  if(bWindowsMenuItem)
4368  menu.AppendMenu(MF_BYPOSITION | MF_STRING, ID_WINDOW_SHOWTABLIST, pT->GetWindowsMenuItemText());
4369  }

4515  {
4516  if(m_bTabCapture)
4517  {
4518  if(m_bTabDrag)
4519  {
4520  TCHITTESTINFO hti = { 0 };
4521  hti.pt.x = GET_X_LPARAM(lParam);
4522  hti.pt.y = GET_Y_LPARAM(lParam);
4523  int nItem = m_tab.HitTest(&hti);
4524  if(nItem != -1)
4525  MovePage(m_nActivePage, nItem);
4526  }
4527

4529  }
4530 
4531  bHandled = FALSE;
4532  return 0;
4533  }

4545  pT->DrawMoveMark(-1);
4546 
4547 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE

4549 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
4550  m_ilDrag.EndDrag();
4551 
4552  m_ilDrag.Destroy();
4553  m_ilDrag.m_hImageList = NULL;
4554  }

4557  bHandled = FALSE;
4558  return 0;

4561  LRESULT OnTabMouseMove(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& bHandled)
4562  {
4563  bHandled = FALSE;
4564 
4565  if(m_bTabCapture)
4566  {
4567  POINT pt = { GET_X_LPARAM(lParam), GET_Y_LPARAM(lParam) };
4568 
4569  if(!m_bTabDrag)
4570  {
4571 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
4572  if(abs(m_ptStartDrag.x - GET_X_LPARAM(lParam)) >= ::GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXDRAG) ||
4573  abs(m_ptStartDrag.y - GET_Y_LPARAM(lParam)) >= ::GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYDRAG))
4574 #else // CE specific
4575  if(abs(m_ptStartDrag.x - GET_X_LPARAM(lParam)) >= 4 ||
4576  abs(m_ptStartDrag.y - GET_Y_LPARAM(lParam)) >= 4)
4577 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
4578  {
4579  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
4580  pT->GenerateDragImage(m_nActivePage);
4581 
4582  int cxCursor = ::GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXCURSOR);
4583  int cyCursor = ::GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYCURSOR);
4584  m_ilDrag.BeginDrag(0, -(cxCursor / 2), -(cyCursor / 2));
4585 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
4586  POINT ptEnter = m_ptStartDrag;
4587  m_tab.ClientToScreen(&ptEnter);
4588  m_ilDrag.DragEnter(GetDesktopWindow(), ptEnter);
4589 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
4590 
4591  m_bTabDrag = true;
4592  }
4593  }
4594 
4595  if(m_bTabDrag)
4596  {
4597  TCHITTESTINFO hti = { 0 };
4598  hti.pt = pt;
4599  int nItem = m_tab.HitTest(&hti);
4600 
4601  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
4602  pT->SetMoveCursor(nItem != -1);
4603 
4604  if(m_nInsertItem != nItem)
4605  pT->DrawMoveMark(nItem);
4606 
4607  m_ilDrag.DragShowNolock((nItem != -1) ? TRUE : FALSE);
4608  m_tab.ClientToScreen(&pt);
4609  m_ilDrag.DragMove(pt);
4610 
4611  bHandled = TRUE;
4612  }
4613  }
4614 
4615  return 0;
4616  }

4655 // Implementation helpers
4656  bool IsValidPageIndex(int nPage) const
4657  {
4658  return (nPage >= 0 && nPage < GetPageCount());
4659  }
4660 
4661  bool MovePage(int nMovePage, int nInsertBeforePage)
4662  {
4663  ATLASSERT(IsValidPageIndex(nMovePage));
4664  ATLASSERT(IsValidPageIndex(nInsertBeforePage));
4665 
4666  if(!IsValidPageIndex(nMovePage) || !IsValidPageIndex(nInsertBeforePage))
4667  return false;
4668 
4669  if(nMovePage == nInsertBeforePage)
4670  return true; // nothing to do
4671 
4672  CTempBuffer<TCHAR, _WTL_STACK_ALLOC_THRESHOLD> buff;
4673  LPTSTR lpstrTabText = buff.Allocate(m_cchTabTextLength + 1);
4674  if(lpstrTabText == NULL)
4675  return false;
4676  TCITEMEXTRA tcix = { 0 };
4677  tcix.tciheader.mask = TCIF_TEXT | TCIF_IMAGE | TCIF_PARAM;
4678  tcix.tciheader.pszText = lpstrTabText;
4679  tcix.tciheader.cchTextMax = m_cchTabTextLength + 1;
4680  BOOL bRet = m_tab.GetItem(nMovePage, tcix);
4681  ATLASSERT(bRet != FALSE);
4682  if(bRet == FALSE)
4683  return false;
4684 
4685  int nInsertItem = (nInsertBeforePage > nMovePage) ? nInsertBeforePage + 1 : nInsertBeforePage;
4686  int nNewItem = m_tab.InsertItem(nInsertItem, tcix);
4687  ATLASSERT(nNewItem == nInsertItem);
4688  if(nNewItem != nInsertItem)
4689  {
4690  ATLVERIFY(m_tab.DeleteItem(nNewItem));
4691  return false;
4692  }
4693 
4694  if(nMovePage > nInsertBeforePage)
4695  ATLVERIFY(m_tab.DeleteItem(nMovePage + 1) != FALSE);
4696  else if(nMovePage < nInsertBeforePage)
4697  ATLVERIFY(m_tab.DeleteItem(nMovePage) != FALSE);
4698 
4699  SetActivePage(nInsertBeforePage);
4700  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
4701  pT->OnPageActivated(m_nActivePage);
4702 
4703  return true;
4704  }

4706 // Implementation overrideables
4707  bool CreateTabControl()
4708  {
4709 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
4710  m_tab.Create(m_hWnd, rcDefault, NULL, WS_CHILD | WS_CLIPSIBLINGS | WS_CLIPCHILDREN | TCS_TOOLTIPS, 0, m_nTabID);
4711 #else // CE specific
4712  m_tab.Create(m_hWnd, rcDefault, NULL, WS_CHILD | WS_CLIPSIBLINGS | WS_CLIPCHILDREN, 0, m_nTabID);
4713 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
4714  ATLASSERT(m_tab.m_hWnd != NULL);
4715  if(m_tab.m_hWnd == NULL)
4716  return false;
4717 
4718  m_tab.SetFont(AtlCreateControlFont());
4719  m_bInternalFont = true;
4720 
4721  m_tab.SetItemExtra(sizeof(TABVIEWPAGE));
4722 
4723  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
4724  m_cyTabHeight = pT->CalcTabHeight();
4725 
4726  return true;
4727  }

4729  int CalcTabHeight()
4730  {
4731  int nCount = m_tab.GetItemCount();
4732  TCITEMEXTRA tcix = { 0 };
4733  tcix.tciheader.mask = TCIF_TEXT;
4734  tcix.tciheader.pszText = _T("NS");
4735  int nIndex = m_tab.InsertItem(nCount, tcix);
4736 
4737  RECT rect = { 0, 0, 1000, 1000 };
4738  m_tab.AdjustRect(FALSE, &rect);
4739 
4740  RECT rcWnd = { 0, 0, 1000, rect.top };
4741  ::AdjustWindowRectEx(&rcWnd, m_tab.GetStyle(), FALSE, m_tab.GetExStyle());
4742 
4743  int nHeight = rcWnd.bottom - rcWnd.top;
4744 
4745  m_tab.DeleteItem(nIndex);
4746 
4747  return nHeight;
4748  }

4756  {

4761  m_tab.SetWindowPos(NULL, 0, 0, rect.right - rect.left, m_cyTabHeight, SWP_NOZORDER);
4762 
4763  if(m_nActivePage != -1)
4764  ::SetWindowPos(GetPageHWND(m_nActivePage), NULL, 0, m_cyTabHeight, rect.right - rect.left, rect.bottom - rect.top - m_cyTabHeight, SWP_NOZORDER);
4765  }

4773  void UpdateTitleBar()
4774  {
4775  if(!m_wndTitleBar.IsWindow() || m_lpstrTitleBarBase == NULL)
4776  return; // nothing to do
4777 
4778  if(m_nActivePage != -1)
4779  {
4780  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
4781  LPCTSTR lpstrTitle = pT->GetPageTitle(m_nActivePage);
4782  LPCTSTR lpstrDivider = pT->GetTitleDividerText();
4783  int cchBuffer = m_cchTitleBarLength + lstrlen(lpstrDivider) + lstrlen(m_lpstrTitleBarBase) + 1;
4784  CTempBuffer<TCHAR, _WTL_STACK_ALLOC_THRESHOLD> buff;
4785  LPTSTR lpstrPageTitle = buff.Allocate(cchBuffer);
4786  ATLASSERT(lpstrPageTitle != NULL);
4787  if(lpstrPageTitle != NULL)
4788  {
4789  pT->ShortenTitle(lpstrTitle, lpstrPageTitle, m_cchTitleBarLength + 1);
4790  SecureHelper::strcat_x(lpstrPageTitle, cchBuffer, lpstrDivider);
4791  SecureHelper::strcat_x(lpstrPageTitle, cchBuffer, m_lpstrTitleBarBase);
4792  }
4793  else
4794  {
4795  lpstrPageTitle = m_lpstrTitleBarBase;
4796  }
4797 
4798  m_wndTitleBar.SetWindowText(lpstrPageTitle);
4799  }
4800  else
4801  {
4802  m_wndTitleBar.SetWindowText(m_lpstrTitleBarBase);
4803  }
4804  }
4805 
4806  void DrawMoveMark(int nItem)
4807  {
4808  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
4809 
4810  if(m_nInsertItem != -1)
4811  {
4812  RECT rect = { 0 };
4813  pT->GetMoveMarkRect(rect);
4814  m_tab.InvalidateRect(&rect);
4815  }
4816 
4817  m_nInsertItem = nItem;
4818 
4819  if(m_nInsertItem != -1)
4820  {
4821  CClientDC dc(m_tab.m_hWnd);
4822 
4823  RECT rect = { 0 };
4824  pT->GetMoveMarkRect(rect);
4825 
4826  CPen pen;
4827  pen.CreatePen(PS_SOLID, 1, ::GetSysColor(COLOR_WINDOWTEXT));
4828  CBrush brush;
4829  brush.CreateSolidBrush(::GetSysColor(COLOR_WINDOWTEXT));
4830 
4831  HPEN hPenOld = dc.SelectPen(pen);
4832  HBRUSH hBrushOld = dc.SelectBrush(brush);
4833 
4834  int x = rect.left;
4835  int y = rect.top;
4836  POINT ptsTop[3] = { { x, y }, { x + m_cxMoveMark, y }, { x + (m_cxMoveMark / 2), y + m_cyMoveMark } };
4837  dc.Polygon(ptsTop, 3);
4838 
4839  y = rect.bottom - 1;
4840  POINT ptsBottom[3] = { { x, y }, { x + m_cxMoveMark, y }, { x + (m_cxMoveMark / 2), y - m_cyMoveMark } };
4841  dc.Polygon(ptsBottom, 3);
4842 
4843  dc.SelectPen(hPenOld);
4844  dc.SelectBrush(hBrushOld);
4845  }
4846  }
4847 
4848  void GetMoveMarkRect(RECT& rect) const
4849  {
4850  m_tab.GetClientRect(&rect);
4851 
4852  RECT rcItem = { 0 };
4853  m_tab.GetItemRect(m_nInsertItem, &rcItem);
4854 
4855  if(m_nInsertItem <= m_nActivePage)
4856  {
4857  rect.left = rcItem.left - m_cxMoveMark / 2 - 1;
4858  rect.right = rcItem.left + m_cxMoveMark / 2;
4859  }
4860  else
4861  {
4862  rect.left = rcItem.right - m_cxMoveMark / 2 - 1;
4863  rect.right = rcItem.right + m_cxMoveMark / 2;
4864  }
4865  }
4866

4870  }
4871 
4872  void GenerateDragImage(int nItem)
4873  {
4874  ATLASSERT(IsValidPageIndex(nItem));
4875 
4876 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
4877  RECT rcItem = { 0 };
4878  m_tab.GetItemRect(nItem, &rcItem);
4879  ::InflateRect(&rcItem, 2, 2); // make bigger to cover selected item
4880 #else // CE specific
4881  nItem; // avoid level 4 warning
4882  RECT rcItem = { 0, 0, 40, 20 };
4883 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
4884 
4885  ATLASSERT(m_ilDrag.m_hImageList == NULL);
4886  m_ilDrag.Create(rcItem.right - rcItem.left, rcItem.bottom - rcItem.top, ILC_COLORDDB | ILC_MASK, 1, 1);
4887 
4888  CClientDC dc(m_hWnd);
4889  CDC dcMem;
4890  dcMem.CreateCompatibleDC(dc);
4891  ATLASSERT(dcMem.m_hDC != NULL);
4892  dcMem.SetViewportOrg(-rcItem.left, -rcItem.top);
4893 
4894  CBitmap bmp;
4895  bmp.CreateCompatibleBitmap(dc, rcItem.right - rcItem.left, rcItem.bottom - rcItem.top);
4896  ATLASSERT(bmp.m_hBitmap != NULL);
4897 
4898  HBITMAP hBmpOld = dcMem.SelectBitmap(bmp);
4899 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
4900  m_tab.SendMessage(WM_PRINTCLIENT, (WPARAM)dcMem.m_hDC);
4901 #else // CE specific
4902  dcMem.Rectangle(&rcItem);
4903 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
4904  dcMem.SelectBitmap(hBmpOld);
4905 
4906  ATLVERIFY(m_ilDrag.Add(bmp.m_hBitmap, RGB(255, 0, 255)) != -1);
4907  }
4908 
4909  void ShortenTitle(LPCTSTR lpstrTitle, LPTSTR lpstrShortTitle, int cchShortTitle)
4910  {
4911  if(lstrlen(lpstrTitle) >= cchShortTitle)
4912  {
4913  LPCTSTR lpstrEllipsis = _T("...");
4914  int cchEllipsis = lstrlen(lpstrEllipsis);
4915  SecureHelper::strncpy_x(lpstrShortTitle, cchShortTitle, lpstrTitle, cchShortTitle - cchEllipsis - 1);
4916  SecureHelper::strcat_x(lpstrShortTitle, cchShortTitle, lpstrEllipsis);
4917  }
4918  else
4919  {
4920  SecureHelper::strcpy_x(lpstrShortTitle, cchShortTitle, lpstrTitle);
4921  }
4922  }
4923

4929  }
4930 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
